title: BI-utvecklare
description:
Vi har nu ett nytt behov och söker därför en konsultkollega med nedan kvalifikationer. Tjänsten är en del av vår konsultverksamhet vilket innebär att du blir anställd av oss och arbetar hos kund alt. interna projekt och åtaganden.

 **Jobbeskrivning**  

Du arbetar med utveckling, förvaltning och drift av befintliga tekniska dataflöden för insamling, bearbetning och visualisering. Rollen innebär att bidra till leverans inom flera strategiska uppdrag med krav på kvalitet, struktur och tillförlitlighet.


Du har mycket god kunskap och erfarenhet inom BI, datamodellering, ETL-flöden och transformationer samt utveckling och förvaltning av datalager. Du är van att arbeta agilt enligt exempelvis Scrum, Kanban eller XP.  

  

**Din profil (Skall krav)**  

* .NET och C#
* HTML5, CSS (Cascading Style Sheets) och Javascript
* MS SQL Server
* Rest API
* Versionshantering (git), bygghantering (gradle), testning
* Python
* Superset
* Jira
* Deltagon
* Secure Forms
* Visual Studio
* Visual studio Code
* Microsoft SSIS, SSAS, SSRS
* Qlik Sense  

  

**Sista ansökningdatum:** 23-02-2026

 **Om Oss**  

Att jobba på Deploja är något helt annat än att arbeta på ett vanligt konsultbolag – och det är vi riktigt stolta över. Vad är det då som gör oss unika?

  

Vi erbjuder helt enkelt mer än bara hög lön och större frihet, det är bara början. Hos oss hittar du den arbetsmiljö och de möjligheter du förtjänar. Här påverkar du din egen lön som helt och hållet som baseras på ditt timpris mot kund.


Vår lönemodell är en hybridlösning mellan en fast månadslön och en provisionsbaserad ersättning. Det innebär att din månadslön baseras på ditt timpris, fast om du mot förmodan skulle stå utan uppdrag så behåller du en grund lön fram tills vi hittat ett nytt uppdrag, bra va?

 **Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**


Spännande uppdrag hos våra många kunder. Vi fokuserar på långsiktiga uppdrag, vilket ger dig möjlighet att skapa värde för kunden samtidigt som du utvecklas själv.


En trygg månadslön – tillsammans bestämmer vi en grundlön baserad på dina uppdrag.


Tjänstebil – vi uppmuntrar dig att välja en elbil för en mer hållbar framtid.


Tjänstepension och stora möjligheter till löneväxling.


Semester - Önskar du mer än 30 dagar semester, kanske 60 dagar?


Privat sjukvårdsförsäkring, olycksfallsförsäkring och livförsäkring för ökad trygghet.

  

Kompetensutveckling – du får själv sätta din budget och välja vilka utbildningar du vill delta i.


Livskvalitet - Har du kanske svårt att få ihop pusslet i vardagen och önskar arbeta lite mindre och ändå kunna tjäna lika mycket om inte mer?  

  

*Vi hanterar ansökningar löpande, med hänsyn till höga arbetstrycket är det extra viktigt med en kort motivering för tjänsten som förklarar hur man möter kraven.*

title: Junior Embedded Software Developer
description:
LumenRadio is a high-tech company with the vision of replacing all cables in the world. We have been leading the wireless transformation within the lighting industry since 2008, where our technology is being used every day in the largest TV and Movie productions in Hollywood, at the Coachella festival, and the Eurovision Song Contest. Our patented technologies provide unprecedented reliability for the most business-critical applications and our products are now also being used in building automation solutions, as well as in heavy industry applications.


Replacing cables in buildings and industrial applications with wireless communication adds value through easier and more flexible installations, lower maintenance costs, and increased range. With the number of cable installations in buildings and industries around the world, the future possibilities are endless. We are looking for you who love to innovate and want to join us in pioneering an evolving industry where more and more local systems are becoming connected.

**Your future**


We are looking for an Embedded Software Developer to join our product development team within Building Controls.


In this role, you will work with both new development and maintenance of embedded systems. You will contribute to requirement analysis, system design, implementation, testing (QA) and acceptance testing, supported by experienced engineers in the team.


Quality is central to how we build products. You will be part of driving structured and automated testing approaches, including unit tests and broader system-level verification.


A key part of our product development approach is understanding our customers’ real-world challenges and the environments in which our products operate. You will gradually build domain knowledge within building automation and take part in technical discussions together with the team and the market.


We are looking for someone who enjoys working with complex systems, structured problem solving and close collaboration. You are comfortable taking ownership of your tasks and contributing to team progress.


As part of maintaining a close dialogue with customers and partners, you may participate in trade shows and engineering meet-ups around the world together with the team.


You will join a technically strong and collaborative team where knowledge sharing and continuous development are part of everyday work.


Meet hiring manager Carl and learn more about the role and the team:

**About you**


We believe you:

* Hold a Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, or equivalent
* Have hands-on experience with embedded C (from studies, thesis, internships, your own projects, or early professional experience)
* Have worked with Python, for example for scripting or testing
* Communicate fluently in English, written and spoken


Experience with CI/CD, hardware testing or electronics is considered a plus.


You have a genuine interest in embedded systems and want to develop robust, high-quality products in a real-world industrial context.


While it's beneficial to have prior knowledge of, it's not essential:

* Networking (IPv6, OSI model etc.)
* Wireless networking (Bluetooth/BLE, Zigbee, WiFi, LoRa, Thread, 6LoWPAN, NB-IoT, 5G etc.)
* Building & industry protocols such as BACnet, Modbus, KNX, Profinet


Our tech stack

* Whatever OS and editor that make you productive
* Arm-gcc, Git, GNU Make
* Robot Framework, GitLab and GitLab CI
* Bluetooth, SPI, UART, our own meshing network stack Mira


We are looking for people who share our values – Reliability, Innovation, Simplicity and Energy.

**Diversity and culture**


We are on a mission to replace all cables in the world, and we are looking for you who share our passion for cutting-edge technology! We value diversity and welcome different-minded professionals who are committed to our ambitious goals. We warmly welcome and encourage job applications from people of all backgrounds and genders.


If you need any adjustments to support you with your application, just let us know by emailing nelly.bertilsson@lumenradio.com.

**Our Benefits**

* We offer good job security through agreements and insurance, paid parental leave, holiday leave, and attractive pension plans
* Yearly health allowance - For your physical activity and well-being
* Yearly personal development allowance - For your brain and creativity
* Free access to the gym in the same building‍️
* Flexible working hours
* Not to mention our coffee club, lunch run, "Among Us" tournaments, and much more!

**More information**  

This is a full-time position at our Head Office in Gothenburg. In this position, you will report to Carl Wäppling, Product Development Manager, Building Controls, and responsible recruiter is Nelly Bertilsson. Don't hesitate to reach out to nelly.bertilsson@lumenradio.com if you have any questions.


We kindly ask not to be contacted for external recruitment services for this recruitment process.

title: Fullstack Developer with frontend focus
description:
Artificial intelligence is transforming society. AI Sweden is the national center for applied artificial intelligence and our mission is to accelerate the use of AI for the benefit of our society, our competitiveness, and for everyone living in Sweden. We drive impactful initiatives in areas such as healthcare, energy, and the public sector while pushing the boundaries of AI research and innovation in fields such as natural language processing and edge learning. Join us in harnessing the untapped value of AI to drive innovation and create sustainable value for Sweden.


We are now expanding our team and looking for an experienced, curious, and product-oriented **Fullstack Developer with frontend focus** to help us build the next generation of AI-powered digital assistants.

### **About the position**


We are developing *Svea* - a shared digital assistant for the Swedish public sector. The initiative brings together technology, law, data and AI adoption to create a common, reliable, and secure AI solution for thousands of users across Sweden.


The project is now entering a major scale-up phase. In this role, you will focus primarily on building and refining the frontend experience, while contributing across the stack when needed. You will design and implement intuitive, accessible, and trustworthy user interfaces for AI-driven workflows, integrate real-time interactions with powerful LLMs, and collaborate closely with developers and data scientists in a small, cross-functional team.


Your work will directly influence how Sweden’s public sector adopts and uses generative AI.


##### **Your main responsibilities**

* Design and develop high-quality software solutions for interacting with generative AI
* Build user-friendly, responsive, and accessible interfaces based on Figma designs
* Collaborate closely with designers, developers, and data scientists throughout the development cycle
* Implement and optimize real-time UI features such as streaming responses and live updates
* Explore and evaluate new technologies to improve performance and user experience
* Help users analyze and visualize data through intuitive tools and workflows

##### **What you bring (Must Have)**

* **4+ years of experience** as a full-stack developer building modern web applications
* **A strong engineering mindset:** you care about building reliable products, writing maintainable code, and improving how things work - and you’re comfortable jumping into a PHP/Laravel + Vue 3 codebase, even if you haven’t worked with that exact stack before
* Strong experience working in a **modern frontend framework**, with solid **TypeScript** skills
* **Curiosity and drive:** you enjoy learning, experimenting, and aren’t afraid to step outside your comfort zone

##### **Nice to Have**

* Experience building responsive, accessible, and well-structured user interfaces
* Comfortable translating Figma into pixel-perfect, production-ready UI
* Experience building real-time UI features (e.g. WebSockets, Laravel Echo, streaming responses, live updates)
* Testing experience (Vitest/Jest/Vue Testing Library)
* Experience working in a PHP/Laravel environment
* Experience with client-side state management or client-side databases (e.g. RxDB or offline-first solutions)
* Solid understanding of relational databases (MySQL/PostgreSQL)

##### **Bonus points**

* Experience building complex, interactive UIs such as chat-like interfaces or AI-powered workflows
* Frontend performance optimization skills (lazy loading, debouncing, efficient rendering, caching strategies)
* Experience with monitoring/logging tools (e.g. Sentry) from a frontend perspective
* Event tracking and analytics for product insights
* Experience with AI-powered interfaces, RAG setups, or data-intensive applications

### **You as a person**


You’re someone who enjoys autonomy, takes initiative, and thrives in fast-paced, impact-oriented environments. You don’t need to be an AI expert, but you believe in the potential of AI to improve society and you want to contribute to that transformation.


At AI Sweden, you’ll work alongside developers, linguists, policy specialists, journalists, historians, entrepreneurs, and leading AI researchers. We value diverse backgrounds and perspectives, and we believe they are essential to solving complex societal challenges

### **Apply Now**

**Application Deadline**: 28 februari 2026 (short deadline)


We look forward to filling this position as soon as possible. Interviews will be held continuously until we find the right candidate. The role is a project-based position, with a start as soon as possible and until end of March 2027. If you have any questions or thoughts, don’t hesitate to contact **Lucas Ambjörn**, AI Transformation Strategist

### **Why work for AI Sweden?**


To us, artificial intelligence is not only about tech, it’s a force for positive societal change. You'll be working alongside leading AI experts, scientists, journalists, linguists, policy professionals, entrepreneurs, change leaders, and many more. To work here, you don’t need to know “everything” about AI, but you need to believe in its potential to help shape our society for the better.


As an organization, we’re uniquely positioned at the sweet spot of governmental influence and startup agility. Small enough to stay adaptive and have fun but backed by and in close contact with both the government, academia and private and public sector.


Join us to make a real-world impact by contributing to initiatives that benefit society and tackle critical challenges. Be at the forefront of AI innovation, working with cutting-edge technologies and playing a key role in shaping the future of AI in Sweden.


And, within our mission, we can most certainly be a platform empowering you to realize your ideas. AI Sweden’s ability to empower partners and individual team members to do exceedingly well in their profession is a key success factor for driving positive and significant impact.


Naturally, we’re under a collective agreement (“kollektivavtal”) and offer everything that comes with it in terms of annual leave, pensions, wellness allowance (“friskvårdsbidrag”), and such.


In short, we like to believe we offer our team members a place to grow, an environment for personal development.

### **An equal and fair working environment**


We strongly believe in diversity and inclusion and are acutely aware of the skewed gender balance in our industry. We actively strive to put together a diverse team in terms of age, gender and background.

*At AI Sweden, we are committed to building diverse and inclusive teams. Some positions may be subject to export control regulations, which means that specific requirements may apply depending on the role. If relevant, we will inform you clearly during the recruitment process.*

*AI Sweden does not accept unsolicited support and kindly ask not to be contacted by any advertisement agents, recruitment agencies or manning companies.*

title: Gameplay Developer / Unreal Engine Developer
description:
*What if you could combine AAA game technology, cloud infrastructure, AI-generated characters and live multiplayer systems — and ship continuously instead of waiting for major releases?*

*At Avanti, we merge two worlds:*  

*Advanced game development and regulated iGaming infrastructure.*

*We replace traditional live studios with scalable, cloud-powered game technology.*

*Instead of physical dealers and static production environments, we build:*

* *Digital human clones powered by motion capture*
* *Real-time streamed multiplayer games*
* *Continuous cloud-based deployment*
* *Highly optimized gameplay systems in Unreal Engine*

*Now we are looking for a* ***Gameplay Developer / Unreal Engine Developer*** *who wants to build the systems behind this experience.*

**The role – a true systems position**
--------------------------------------


This is not a feature-by-feature implementation role. It is a systems role.


You will work at the core of our real-time platform, designing and developing gameplay systems in **Unreal Engine 5**, using **C++ and advanced Blueprints** to create scalable, performance-optimized logic.


Your focus will include:

* Design and implement gameplay systems for live casino games using Unreal Engine
* Integrate WebRTC streaming technology with gameplay mechanics
* Work with Metahuman characters and live capture data integration
* Develop player interaction systems that work seamlessly with live dealer streams
* Create robust, scalable multiplayer game logic and networking solutions
* Optimize performance for web-based streaming environments with real-time Metahuman rendering
* Collaborate with animators and artists to integrate motion capture data into Metahuman characters


You will collaborate closely with animators and technical artists to ensure characters, props and animation behave seamlessly inside the engine.


We iterate continuously. Systems evolve. Improvements are pushed frequently.

**The tech stack**
------------------


You will work with:

**Unreal Engine 5, C++, Blueprint** , state machines, motion capture integration, Perforce and Google Cloud Platform (GCP) in a real-time multiplayer environment.


AAA background is not required.  

Experience building and shipping stable systems is.

**Who you are**
---------------


You have solid experience working with Unreal Engine and feel comfortable in both C++ and Blueprint architecture. You understand gameplay systems, animation logic and performance constraints.


You likely:

* Enjoy solving technical complexity
* Take ownership of your work
* Communicate clearly across disciplines
* Improve systems rather than waiting for perfect conditions


We value accountability, curiosity and clarity.

**Why Avanti?**
---------------


We operate at the intersection of game technology and regulated iGaming. Few companies globally are combining Unreal Engine, motion capture, AI-generated characters and cloud streaming at this scale.


We are a stable company and are currently scaling our company with plans to expand the coming years!


Our platform is powered by Google Cloud and built for continuous deployment. We deliver scalable digital experiences to operators such as LeoVegas and Svenska Spel.


You get:

* Stock option program in the future
* Wellness allowance & gym membership
* Hybrid setup
* An English-speaking, technically driven team


Startup energy. Backed by capital. Real customers.

**The process**
---------------

* Initial conversation
* Technical deep dive
* Final discussion with the Hiring Manager


Efficient and respectful of your time.


If you enjoy building real systems in Unreal Engine and want to work at the frontier of real-time multiplayer technology — we would love to connect.


Let’s build something that reshapes an industry.

title: Web3 Developer
description:
**Your Mission:**


At Bitrefill, we’re looking for a Web3 Developer who’s not just talented but driven by a passion for crypto and cutting-edge web3 technology. In this role, you'll dive deep into building and optimizing our crypto payment solutions, driving real impact by integrating with suppliers and enhancing the backbone of our services. You'll work closely with a dynamic team of backend and frontend developers as well as creative designers, ensuring everything we build is fast, reliable, and scales effortlessly.


If you’re the kind of person who’s obsessed with learning, loves solving complex challenges, and thrives in a fast-paced, innovative environment, this is the place for you! We want someone who takes pride in their work and gets things done.

**Our Tech Stack:**

* Node/TypeScript
* React
* MongoDB, MySQL
* Amazon AWS, Kubernetes

**Your Responsibilities:**

* Manage and maintain the payment display part of our payment flow (Payment URI, address display and QR code, etc)
* Handle our wallet ecosystem, both maintaining the standards and working with non-standard wallets
* Stay current with wallet trends to ensure our wallet selector is up to date and advancing with new trends
* Maintain and evolve our wallet connect stack (WalletConnect, MetaMask, Coinbase)
* Manage the React tooling for WEB3 (Wagmi) and improve it
* Understand the difference between our various environments (Website, App and affiliate widget) and be the point of contact for the various teams interacting with it

 **You bring with you:**

* You reside in Americas or EU time zones
* Minimum 2-3 years of React experience, good understanding of performance and third-party tooling trade-off
* Professional experience with our tech stack or personal projects related to web3 technologies and payments
* Active participation in the web3 community
* Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with fluency in written and spoken English
* The ability to thrive in fast-paced, team-oriented environments, along with the capability to work independently
* The willingness to champion your ideas in the web3 space and bring them to fruition
* Practical AI integration in your daily work, driven by what works, not what's trendy

 **What is Bitrefill?**  

Bitrefill is the global leader in crypto commerce. The one-stop shop where people go to buy real-world things with their coins. We unlock the power of internet money for the global spender and strive to enable financial freedom for everyone. We have four main product lines: Bitrefill Card, Gift Cards, eSIMs, and our mobile app.

**Why Bitrefill**  

Apart from the perks of working with us, you will become part of a passionate and talented team with high ambitions for a world where crypto is money for everyday use.


You will find a challenging workplace and a great education regarding everything involving crypto.


We are a remote-first company, since before it was cool. We believe in the freedom to work remotely and flexibly.


You will join an amazing and creative group of people who love building new things and making an impact.


At Bitrefill you're given real ownership over your work and the trust to get things done. You just need to roll up your sleeves and get started.


There’s always someone around to bounce ideas off and collaborate with, as well as regular gatherings, meetups, and conferences to keep connected beyond the screen.  

  

If you are wondering if this is for you, you can read more here:  

* **Who we are**
* **How we work**
 **Our Hiring Process is** **here****.**

title: Utvecklare mot säkra Windows-system
description:
#### **Vill du vara med och bidra till ett säkrare samhälle?**


För över femton år sedan startade Basalt med en enkel men avgörande idé att stärka Sveriges motståndskraft. Idag är vi ett av landets ledande produkt- och konsultbolag inom verksamhets och säkerhetsskydd och vi fortsätter växa. Samtidigt är vi ett stabilt och välmående bolag som värnar om vår familjära kultur och om medarbetarnas välbefinnande. Hos oss får du anställningstrygghet, respekt, konkurrenskraftig pension och förmåner samt en balans mellan arbete och fritid. Vi prioriterar lärande och utveckling och du får möjlighet att göra verklig skillnad och samtidigt må bra.  

  

På Basalt utvecklar vi marknadens säkraste it-plattform och stöttar samhällsviktiga aktörer i att skydda sina mest värdefulla tillgångar mot både yttre och inre hot. Genom våra lösningar bidrar vi till att hålla igång de verksamheter som får samhället att fungera även vid stora störningar eller kriser. Här får du arbeta med teknik som gör konkret skillnad och ingå i ett team som drivs av innovation, kvalitet och ett tydligt syfte.  

  

Om du vill vara med på en spännande utvecklingsresa i rollen som utvecklare där ditt arbete gör skillnad, då är Basalt platsen för dig.

**Om rollen**  

Hos oss blir du en del av ett erfaret och engagerat team som utvecklar och förvaltar ett komplext, samhällskritiskt ledningssystem åt en av våra kunder. Det vi bygger har betydelse och ställer höga krav på kvalitet och säkerhet. I rollen får du vara med och utveckla ny funktionalitet samtidigt som du vidareutvecklar och stärker befintliga lösningar. Du arbetar i ett agilt team där samarbete, kunskapsdelning och teknisk nyfikenhet är en naturlig del av vardagen.
  

  

Utvecklingen sker inhouse i en säker miljö där vi tillsammans skapar robusta, långsiktiga lösningar som bidrar till att stärka Sveriges säkerhet. Hos oss får du möjlighet att växa och ta nästa steg mot att bli expert inom säker och avancerad systemutveckling.  

  

**Din bakgrund**  

Vi söker dig som är i början av din karriär eller har längre erfarenhet och vill ta ansvar, arbeta självständigt och samarbeta nära teamet. Rollen formas utifrån dina styrkor och erfarenheter. Gemensamt är ett starkt teknikintresse och en vilja att utvecklas.

* Erfarenhet av Windows Server genom administration, förvaltning eller utveckling nära plattformen
* Erfarenhet av programmering i exempelvis C#, Python eller PowerShell.
* Kommunicerar obehindrat på svenska och engelska, i både tal och skrift
* Arbetar strukturerat med dokumentation, spårbarhet och kvalitet
* Hög säkerhets- och sekretessmedvetenhet

 **Vi erbjuder**  

För att ge dig trygghet och stabilitet erbjuder vi ett förmånspaket som inkluderar en av marknadens bästa pensionslösningar, omfattande försäkringar, förstärkt föräldralön, och ett generöst friskvårdsbidrag på 5 000 kr/år. Vi erbjuder kontinuerliga möjligheter till kompetensutveckling och du får även tillgång till Benifex, där du kan hitta en mängd extra förmåner. Vi erbjuder tjänstledighet med löneutfyllnad för medarbetare som tjänstgör inom Försvarsmakten, inklusive GSS/T, reservofficerare och hemvärnssoldater.  

  

Vi värnar om balansen mellan arbete och fritid. Med flexibla arbetstider, 5-timmars arbetsdag innan helgdagar och ledigt på klämdagar ser vi till att du har tid för både ditt jobb och ditt privatliv. Dessutom anordnar vi gemensamma aktiviteter, såsom skidresor, träningspass och sociala luncher, för att stärka sammanhållningen och göra arbetsplatsen ännu trevligare.  

  

Vi strävar efter att du ska känna stolthet och trivsel hos oss på Basalt. Du kan läsa mer om våra förmåner och om hur det är att arbeta på Basalt **här!**  

  

**Din ansökan**  

Ansök med ditt CV och beskriv kort vad du söker i din nästa roll och svara på urvalsfrågorna. Har du frågor? Hör gärna av dig till Kajsa-Stina Åkerblom på 076 763 99 97 eller på kajsa-stina.akerblom@basalt.se.  

  

Vi ställer höga krav på våra medarbetares säkerhets- och sekretessmedvetande. Våra anställda är placerade i säkerhetsklass i enlighet med de krav som finns i Säkerhetsskyddslagen då våra kunders verksamhet kräver detta, vilket medför att svenskt medborgarskap är ett villkor för tjänsten.  

  

*Vi söker även fler kollegor. Läs mer om våra lediga tjänster* ***här.***  

  

**Basalt i korthet:**

* Grundat 2009, idag ca 140 medarbetare
* Kontor i Stockholm och Enköping
* En del av Omegapoint Group
* Ledande inom säkra it-lösningar och systematiskt säkerhetsarbete
* Vision: att vara det självklara valet för ett robust och säkert samhälle

  

Varmt välkommen med din ansökan!

title: Software Developer
description:
Invenco by GVR — Software Developer


Invenco by GVR is a global leader in integrated payments, point-of-sale and forecourt automation solutions for convenience retail. Our site controller platform runs terminals, pumps/dispensers, payments and back-office services at forecourts across many countries and more than 10,000 terminals.


Join our established R&D team in Bromma, Sweden, where you will use your skills and knowledge of C#.NET and C++ to work on terminal-level and dispenser-related code and gain deep knowledge of fuel-forecourt systems and end to end payment flows.

**Day-to-day responsibilities:**

* Design, develop and maintain components of the site controller (primarily back-end).
* Implement and troubleshoot payment integrations (connections to banks and card schemes).
* Work with embedded terminal and dispenser interfaces on forecourts; debug device-level behaviour and interactions with higher-level services
* Work within a single scrum team, take ownership of delivery tasks, attend daily stand-ups, weekly team meetings and regular one-to-ones.
* Produce and review code, run tests, and support deployments/operational troubleshooting.
* Deliver back-office features: reporting, remote price changes, tank-level data and other forecourt services.
* Liaise with project managers, QA and other stakeholders; take responsibility for assigned features.

**What we are looking for:**  

We seek a capable, driven Software Developer (C# .NET & C++) who excels both in team settings and when working solo. You own your work end to end, work hands on across frontend and backend, and prioritise delivering meaningful results quickly. You’re proactive, self-motivated, inquisitive, and enjoy a varied workload.

 **About you:**

**Essential:**

* University degree in a relevant subject
* Solid experience developing in C#/.NET (ideally 5+ years)
* Comfortable with C++ — either current experience or willingness/ability to pick it up and work in lower-level code.
* Strong English and Swedish (spoken and written)
* Experience working in an agile/scrum team and standard software engineering practices (code reviews, testing, CI).
* Proactive in problem solving and taking ownership and accountability
* Curiosity with a learning mindset
* Ability to adapt

**Desirable:**

* Experience with terminals, device communication or low-level protocols.
* Cloud or microservices experience.
* Experience with country-specific fiscal/regulatory payment requirements

**How we reward you:**

* Structured onboarding and mentorship.
* Clear routes for development within the team.
* Collective bargaining agreement (TAG) benefits apply
* Annual health benefit (for example, support for gym membership).
* Standard Swedish holiday entitlement and an extra time-compensation scheme
* Hybrid working, a dedicated desk and lab access for hands-on work.

 **What's next:**

* Submit your CV in English advising your level of Swedish language
* Initial Teams video meeting will be conducted in English
* Full technical interviews will be held on site in Bromma and conducted in Swedish

**Please note that unfortunately, we cannot assist with relocation or visa sponsorship.**

 **WHO IS INVENCO by GVR**


Invenco by GVR is a dynamic and innovative force in the technology-driven retail solutions. Born from integrating groups within the Gilbarco Veeder-Root network and the strategic acquisition of technology companies worldwide, our foundation is built on tech expertise. With a diverse set of industry leaders including Orpak, Invenco, Insite360 & GVR, we have formed a network of excellence. Our team members are located in over 20 countries and we are proud of the global diversity of our teams.

**WHO IS VONTIER**  

Vontier (NYSE: VNT) is a global technology company powering the way the world moves. We empower businesses in the transport sector to adapt to a fast-changing landscape by uniting productivity, automation and multi-energy technologies.


Our smart, connected solutions serve roadside convenience retail stores, fleet operators, and auto repair technicians. From integrated payments and EV charging software to carwash technology and retail automation, we help customers stay productive and prepared for a rapidly evolving industry.  

  

With decades of expertise and a balanced portfolio, Vontier enables businesses to navigate complexity, unlock growth, and build a cleaner, safer future. Driven by continuous improvement and the dedication of Team Vontier, we empower businesses to think bigger, act boldly, and thrive on the road ahead. Learn more at www.vontier.com  

  

**At Vontier, we empower you to steer your career in the direction of success with a dynamic, innovative, and inclusive environment.**  

  

Our commitment to personal growth, work-life balance, and collaboration fuels a culture where your contributions drive meaningful change. We provide the roadmap for continuous learning, allowing creativity to flourish and ideas to accelerate into impactful solutions that contribute to a sustainable future.  

  

Join our community of passionate people working together to navigate challenges and seize new opportunities. At Vontier, you are not on this journey alone, we are committed to equipping you with the tools and support you need to fuel your innovation, lead with impact, and thrive both personally and professionally.  

  

**Together, let’s power the way the world moves!**

title: Java developer
description:
* Help design, build and continuously improve the clients online platform
* Research, suggest and implement new technology solutions following best practices/standards
* Take responsibility for the resiliency and availability of different products
* Be a productive member of the team.


 Requirements
   

  

* 5 years of experience as an Architect, delivering comprehensive solution designs and architectural guidance across business, application, data, process, and technology domains. Skilled in evaluating alternative approaches, outlining benefits and drawbacks, and producing key architectural artifacts such as High-Level Design (HLD) documents.
* Strong technical expertise in Java, Databases, Red Hat, Angular, REST APIs, SOAP Web Services, Microservices, and integration design patterns, along with hands-on experience in Microsoft Azure and Amazon Web Services (AWS) cloud platforms.
* Solid understanding of Agile methodologies, including Scrum and SAFe, with experience working in iterative and collaborative development environments.
* Passionate about simplifying complex problems and effectively communicating solutions in a clear, structured, and understandable manner to both technical and non-technical stakeholders.
* Experienced in working within large enterprise environments, navigating complex organizational structures and cross-functional collaboration.
* Strong communication skills with a collaborative mindset; a team player who values knowledge sharing and continuous learning.

 Benefits
   

  

* A challenging, innovating environment.
* Opportunities for learning where needed.

title: Fullstack Developer with frontend focus
description:
Artificial intelligence is transforming society. AI Sweden is the national center for applied artificial intelligence and our mission is to accelerate the use of AI for the benefit of our society, our competitiveness, and for everyone living in Sweden. We drive impactful initiatives in areas such as healthcare, energy, and the public sector while pushing the boundaries of AI research and innovation in fields such as natural language processing and edge learning. Join us in harnessing the untapped value of AI to drive innovation and create sustainable value for Sweden.
   

  

 We are now expanding our team and looking for an experienced, curious, and product-oriented
 **Fullstack Developer with frontend focus** 
 to help us build the next generation of AI-powered digital assistants.
   

  

**About The Position**
 We are developing
 *Svea* 
 - a shared digital assistant for the Swedish public sector. The initiative brings together technology, law, data and AI adoption to create a common, reliable, and secure AI solution for thousands of users across Sweden.
   

  

 The project is now entering a major scale-up phase. In this role, you will focus primarily on building and refining the frontend experience, while contributing across the stack when needed. You will design and implement intuitive, accessible, and trustworthy user interfaces for AI-driven workflows, integrate real-time interactions with powerful LLMs, and collaborate closely with developers and data scientists in a small, cross-functional team.
   

  

 Your work will directly influence how Sweden’s public sector adopts and uses generative AI.
   

  

****Your main responsibilities****
* Design and develop high-quality software solutions for interacting with generative AI
* Build user-friendly, responsive, and accessible interfaces based on Figma designs
* Collaborate closely with designers, developers, and data scientists throughout the development cycle
* Implement and optimize real-time UI features such as streaming responses and live updates
* Explore and evaluate new technologies to improve performance and user experience
* Help users analyze and visualize data through intuitive tools and workflows


****What you bring (Must Have)****
* 4+ years of experience as a full-stack developer building modern web applications
* A strong engineering mindset: you care about building reliable products, writing maintainable code, and improving how things work - and you’re comfortable jumping into a PHP/Laravel + Vue 3 codebase, even if you haven’t worked with that exact stack before
* Strong experience working in a modern frontend framework, with solid TypeScript skills
* Curiosity and drive: you enjoy learning, experimenting, and aren’t afraid to step outside your comfort zone


****Nice to Have****
* Experience building responsive, accessible, and well-structured user interfaces
* Comfortable translating Figma into pixel-perfect, production-ready UI
* Experience building real-time UI features (e.g. WebSockets, Laravel Echo, streaming responses, live updates)
* Testing experience (Vitest/Jest/Vue Testing Library)
* Experience working in a PHP/Laravel environment
* Experience with client-side state management or client-side databases (e.g. RxDB or offline-first solutions)
* Solid understanding of relational databases (MySQL/PostgreSQL)


****Bonus points****
* Experience building complex, interactive UIs such as chat-like interfaces or AI-powered workflows
* Frontend performance optimization skills (lazy loading, debouncing, efficient rendering, caching strategies)
* Experience with monitoring/logging tools (e.g. Sentry) from a frontend perspective
* Event tracking and analytics for product insights
* Experience with AI-powered interfaces, RAG setups, or data-intensive applications


 You as a person
   

  

 You’re someone who enjoys autonomy, takes initiative, and thrives in fast-paced, impact-oriented environments. You don’t need to be an AI expert, but you believe in the potential of AI to improve society and you want to contribute to that transformation.
   

  

 At AI Sweden, you’ll work alongside developers, linguists, policy specialists, journalists, historians, entrepreneurs, and leading AI researchers. We value diverse backgrounds and perspectives, and we believe they are essential to solving complex societal challenges
   

  

 Apply Now
   

  

**Application Deadline** 
 : 28 februari 2026 (short deadline)
   

  

 We look forward to filling this position as soon as possible. Interviews will be held continuously until we find the right candidate. The role is a project-based position, with a start as soon as possible and until end of March 2027. If you have any questions or thoughts, don’t hesitate to contact
 **Lucas Ambjörn** 
 , AI Transformation Strategist
   

  

 Why work for AI Sweden?
   

  

 To us, artificial intelligence is not only about tech, it’s a force for positive societal change. You'll be working alongside leading AI experts, scientists, journalists, linguists, policy professionals, entrepreneurs, change leaders, and many more. To work here, you don’t need to know “everything” about AI, but you need to believe in its potential to help shape our society for the better.
   

  

 As an organization, we’re uniquely positioned at the sweet spot of governmental influence and startup agility. Small enough to stay adaptive and have fun but backed by and in close contact with both the government, academia and private and public sector.
   

  

 Join us to make a real-world impact by contributing to initiatives that benefit society and tackle critical challenges. Be at the forefront of AI innovation, working with cutting-edge technologies and playing a key role in shaping the future of AI in Sweden.
   

  

 And, within our mission, we can most certainly be a platform empowering you to realize your ideas. AI Sweden’s ability to empower partners and individual team members to do exceedingly well in their profession is a key success factor for driving positive and significant impact.
   

  

 Naturally, we’re under a collective agreement (“kollektivavtal”) and offer everything that comes with it in terms of annual leave, pensions, wellness allowance (“friskvårdsbidrag”), and such.
   

  

 In short, we like to believe we offer our team members a place to grow, an environment for personal development.
   

  

 An equal and fair working environment
   

  

 We strongly believe in diversity and inclusion and are acutely aware of the skewed gender balance in our industry. We actively strive to put together a diverse team in terms of age, gender and background.
   

  

*At AI Sweden, we are committed to building diverse and inclusive teams. Some positions may be subject to export control regulations, which means that specific requirements may apply depending on the role. If relevant, we will inform you clearly during the recruitment process.*
*AI Sweden does not accept unsolicited support and kindly ask not to be contacted by any advertisement agents, recruitment agencies or manning companies.*

title: Frontend Developer
description:
**About Us:** 




 At Paranex, we are building the future of customer service on a foundation of proven success. Based in Stockholm, our team is developing next-generation AI agents powered by the real-world data and technology of an established, live platform. We offer the agility of a start-up with the reliability of a proven solution.
 



  





**Role Overview:** 




 We are seeking a experienced Frontend Developer to join our dynamic tech team. In this role, you will play a pivotal part in developing cutting-edge software solutions. Your key responsibilities will encompass all aspects of the software development lifecycle, ensuring the delivery of robust and innovative solutions. Your expertise in frontend development will ensure the successful delivery of high-quality software products that meet and exceed client expectations.
 



  





**Responsibilities:** 




 As part of an Agile software development team, the key responsibilities for the role are:
 



  




* Proactively contribute to all aspects of the software development lifecycle, including analysis, design, implementation, testing, delivery and maintenance of the frontend stack.
* Work closely with the development team and business stakeholders with a problem-solution approach.



  





**Requirements:** 



* 5+ years experience with Typescript
* 5+ years of experience with libraries/frameworks such as (React.Js or Vue.Js, etc.).
* Experience with HTML5 and CSS3
* Experienced with automated testing (unit, integration).
* Good understanding of containerization and Docker.
* Good understanding of SOLID principles and Clean Code.
* Good understanding of cloud-based systems (AWS, Azure, etc.)
* Fluency in English.



  





**The following skills would also be an advantage:** 



* Infrastructure as Code (AWS CloudFormation, Terraform, Ansible, etc.)
* Event driven architectures (EDA)
* Modular and Microservice based architectures
* Real time communication (Websockets)
* Domain Driven Design (DDD)
* CQRS
* Event Sourcing
* Test Driven Development (TDD)
* NoSql databases (MongoDb)



  





**Our Approach to Software Development:** 



* We value collaboration and proactive problem-solving.
* We work closely with business experts to ensure our solutions meet both problem and solution scopes effectively.
* We practise Domain-Driven Design (DDD), emphasising DDD strategic patterns (ubiquitous language, bounded contexts, event modelling) to build and deliver software tailored to business needs.
* We embrace DevOps as a culture, where the development team actively participates in all aspects of software development, from conception to delivery, monitoring, and maintenance.
* We adhere to Agile principles and prioritise quick responses to changing business needs.
* We follow a Continuous Integration/Continuous Delivery process (CI/CD) with trunk-based development. Automated testing (unit, integration, and end-to-end) is integral to our approach, along with strategies like feature toggles, canary releases, and a build-once deliver-anywhere approach.



  





**Why You'll Love Working with Us:** 



* Work with modern AI technologies in a product-focused environment.
* Collaborate with experienced colleagues in a supportive, problem-solving team.
* Hybrid work: 3 days per week in our office in central Stockholm, Sweden.
* Opportunities for learning, growth and professional development.
* Competitive salary based on experience and skills.

title: Senior Software Engineer
description:
**Join ANIMARUM – Senior Software Engineer (Backend)** 




 At ANIMARUM, we believe technology should empower people. We are now looking for a Senior Software Engineer with a strong backend focus to strengthen our internal team and deliver high-quality, impactful solutions for our client. You will contribute to solutions for a global industrial organization that plays a vital role in enabling sustainable mining and infrastructure development worldwide.
 



  





**About the Role** 




 In this role, you will play a key part in designing, building, and maintaining our integration landscape. You will work primarily with .NET and Azure technologies and be responsible for managing and evolving the company’s integration layer, connecting internal systems (such as ERP) with external partners.
 



**Your responsibilities will include:** 



* Designing, building, and maintaining robust integrations using .NET and Azure.
* Managing and evolving the company-wide integration architecture.
* Driving improvements in DevOps processes, including optimizing PBI pipelines and Kanban workflows to enhance agile delivery and team responsiveness.
* Establishing and maintaining a structured integration request process, from ServiceNow intake to production deployment, ensuring clear ownership, accountability, and reduced time-to-market.
* Working with modern technologies such as Machine Learning and AI to solve complex challenges within autonomous operations.
* Improving ways of working by breaking down PBIs into smaller, flow-oriented tasks to increase clarity, ownership, and delivery efficiency.
* Designing and implementing a structured and maintainable documentation strategy for all integrations.



**Your Technical Profile** 




 We believe you have strong experience in several of the following areas:
 


* C#, .NET
* REST APIs
* Microsoft Azure & Azure DevOps
* CI/CD, Microservices
* Integration Architecture
* Event-Driven Architecture
* Clean Architecture
* SQL & MongoDB
* OAuth 2.0 & OpenID Connect (OIDC)
* Grafana
* Experience in Robotics or AI-driven solutions is considered a strong plus.



  





**Who You Are** 




 You thrive in a culture built on collaboration, innovation, transparency, and strong customer focus. You take ownership, care about both technical excellence and team well-being, and actively promote knowledge sharing and open-mindedness.
 



 You are comfortable taking responsibility end-to-end – from architecture and implementation to governance and continuous improvement.
 



**Hybrid Workplace** 




 We offer the possibility of a hybrid workplace. This flexible way of working supports a healthy balance between professional and personal life, depending on your role, responsibilities, and individual circumstances.
 



**Why ANIMARUM?** 




 At ANIMARUM, it is not just about the job,  it is about being part of a team where people truly matter.
 



 We offer:
 


* A human-centered culture with a strong focus on work-life balance.
* Flexibility to combine your career with your personal life.
* Meaningful benefits: wellness allowance (5,000 SEK), company car or bike options, and an SL travel card.
* The opportunity to give back, donate to a charity of your choice each year.
* Competitive compensation and stock options, because our people are our greatest asset.
* Join us and help shape the future of technology – with a human touch.

title: Backend developer
description:
**About Froda**
 Froda was founded in 2015 with a clear vision – to revolutionize the banking experience for entrepreneurs by making it easy and affordable to invest in their ideas. Today, we are one of Sweden's fastest-growing fintech companies with large international growth plans. We are a creative tech company with the ambition to turn a historically expensive and unfair industry into something ethical and sustainable by promoting entrepreneurship.
   

  

 Our mission to revolutionize the banking experience for entrepreneurs is not only reflected in our products but also in our workplace. By fostering a culture of respect, collaboration, and continuous learning, we provide opportunities for personal growth and professional development. Join us in transforming the banking industry and be a part of our journey to empower entrepreneurs.
   

  

**About The Role**
 To further develop and scale our tech platform, enabling us to continue improving the banking experience for entrepreneurs, we are expanding our tech department. As a Backend Developer at Froda, you will be part of a cross-functional team working in one of our product areas — either developing features for our partners, improving our credit systems or maintaining our loan and payments core. For each team, the idea is to continuously deliver customer value as well as to improve the technical structure to make sure our systems are stable and healthy. Together with your team, you will design, build, and deliver scalable and maintainable solutions that directly impact our customers.
   

  

 You will get a unique chance to be a part of a scaling fintech company with strong momentum and a stable foundation, backed by a banking license as a quality stamp.
   

  

**Who are you?**
 We believe that you are an experienced and curious developer who thrives in collaborative environments and is passionate about building scalable solutions with real impact. You enjoy working closely with other skilled and open-minded professionals and actively contribute to knowledge sharing and continuous improvement. You are a pragmatic problem solver who communicates clearly with both technical and non-technical stakeholders. You are fluent in both English and Swedish.
   

  

 We believe that you have experience of:
   

  

* At least 4 years in a similar role, ideally within product-focused teams
* Programming in C#/.NET with a solid understanding of modern software design principles
* Working with SQL and NoSQL databases in production environments
* Cloud platforms such as Azure (or other major providers)
* Agile methodologies and best practices in software engineering, including testing, CI/CD, and DevOps mindset
* Experience with Docker, Kubernetes, RabbitMQ, and microservices architecture is a strong plus


**What’s in it for you?**
 At Froda, you’ll be part of a company that combines the best of both worlds – a fast-moving, high-energy culture with the stability and structure to support long-term success. We’re 100+ ambitious self-starters who genuinely care for each other and the work we do, all while having fun together.
   

  

 Here, you’ll have the opportunity to take ownership of your work, develop your skills, and shape your own growth journey. With big ambitions and a rapidly evolving business, there’s plenty of room to grow, lead initiatives, and make a real impact on both our company and the industry. If you're looking to be part of a success story and contribute to something bigger, this is the place for you.
   

  

 Furthermore, you’ll get:
   

  

* An opportunity to be part of an exciting journey, shaping the future of our company and transforming the SME financing landscape
* Fabulous office overlooking Stockholm and a friendly culture that values work/life balance
* We prioritize working in the office to maximize the positive impact of in-person collaboration, but we offer flexibility with work hours and remote work
* Competitive compensation package
* Insurance and pension plan


 This role is all about building the tech that powers funding for thousands of entrepreneurs —if you're excited by our mission, apply or tell a friend!

title: Software Engineer
description:
Description: We are looking for a Software Engineer with experience in QlikSense platform. The role includes variety of different responsibilities.
 



 a) New and existing QlikSense applications enhacements - analyzing, designing, developing, testing and maintaining services delivered by the team for stakeholders across the bank.
 



 b) The person will be involved to Qlik Pre-Cloud investigation tasks.
 



 c) The person should be experienced working with Javascript and React. These competences are needed for new and existing Qlik applications developments.

title: Software Engineer
description:
**About Lavoit** 




 Lavoit builds the operational intelligence layer for industrial infrastructure.
 



 We are a Swedish company founded by engineers with deep experience in industrial automation and electrochemistry. We started by building electrolyzers — systems designed to cut electricity consumption through better catalysts. That work revealed a larger problem: existing control systems were never built for hydrogen's specific challenges.
 



 Electrochemical systems are now grid-critical assets, shaped by volatile energy markets, degradation constraints and the demand for reliable clean production. Lavoit exists to solve this. We are a software partner for operational sites — your savings are our business.
 



 Starting with hydrogen. The mission is broader: making industrial infrastructure adaptive, predictive and intelligent.
 



 The pace is blistering. The pressure is maximum. If you want a comfortable 9-to-5, do not apply. We aren't here for incremental gains. If you want to build the ship while shipping and look back in 10 years knowing you changed the world, welcome home.
 



  





**Mission** 




 Build the intelligence layer for the physical world. Industrial systems are complex, dynamic and governed by physics. You will develop the full technology stack — from edge devices on the factory floor to cloud-based AI — that understands industrial context, reasons about complex environments and automates workflows that previously required human experts.
 



  





**What You Will Do** 



* Build and own full-stack applications end to end, from backend APIs and data pipelines to frontend interfaces used by operators and customers
* Develop agentic AI systems that operate inside real industrial environments
* Build systems that reason over documentation, sensor data and system behavior
* Create autonomous workflows that remove human bottlenecks
* Work with Linux-based edge devices and Raspberry Pis to deploy software at the hardware boundary, collecting data and running intelligence close to industrial equipment
* Integrate physics, simulation output and real-time constraints into intelligent decisions
* Shape the architecture and foundations of Lavoit's technology platform across all layers
* Collaborate with simulation, electrochemistry and platform engineers to ground the intelligence in reality
* Prototype quickly, test rigorously and ship continuously



  





**Who You Are** 



* Strong Python engineer with experience across the full stack — backend services, frontend development and system integration
* Hands-on experience with Linux environments, Raspberry Pis or similar edge devices — you have built, deployed and maintained software on real hardware
* Experience with or deep interest in agentic systems, RAG or LLM orchestration
* Comfortable working across backend frameworks, databases, APIs and modern frontend technologies
* You operate with execution, speed and complete ownership
* You work tightly aligned with a world-class team of engineers and scientists
* You communicate clearly, collaborate deeply and treat alignment as a core part of building great systems
* You are highly self-reflective and continuously improving your reasoning and approach
* You become obsessed with solving complex physical-world problems
* You love to win and treat engineering as a competitive craft
* You thrive in pressure, ambiguity and fast decision cycles
* You want to build real-world industrial intelligence rather than chat interfaces or incremental features

title: Software Developer
description:
**Professional Galaxy** 
 är ett IT och teknikkonsultbolag som tillhandahåller högspecialiserad kompetens inom IT, utveckling, elektronik och mekanik konstruktion. Vi arbetar med seniora experter och levererar strategiskt värdeskapande kompetens till några av Sveriges mest komplexa och samhällskritiska projekt. Vårt fokus ligger alltid på hög kvalitet, professionalism och mätbara resultat.
   

  

 Är du rätt person för uppdraget, eller vill du rekommendera en stark kandidat? Tveka inte att kontakta oss.
   

  

 Ansök gärna redan idag – urval och intervjuer sker löpande.
   

  

 Professional Galaxy söker en
 **Software Developer** 
 på uppdrag av vår klient.
   

  

**Uppdragsbeskrivning** 
 – Vidareutveckling av prototyp för Ground Combat Station
   

  

 Vi arbetar med drönarapplikationer och har utvecklat en prototyp för en Ground Combat Station. Nästa steg är att definiera hur denna prototyp ska vidareutvecklas till en robust, skalbar och långsiktigt hållbar lösning.
   

  

 Vi utgår från att det inom företag finns befintliga plattformar, ramverk eller initiativ som kan fungera som byggblock eller integrationsplattformar för vår applikation. Syftet med uppdraget är att identifiera och utvärdera dessa möjligheter samt bedöma hur de kan möta våra tekniska och operativa krav.
   

  

**Uppdragets omfattning**
 Konsulten kommer att:
   

  

 Analysera den befintliga prototypen, inklusive arkitektur och teknisk inriktning
   

  

 Identifiera och utvärdera relevanta interna plattformar och initiativ inom företag
   

  

 Bedöma hur dessa plattformar kan stödja våra operativa användningsfall och systemkrav
   

  

 Föreslå en utvecklingsstrategi och arkitekturell inriktning
   

  

 Bidra praktiskt genom prototyparbete och demoimplementationer för att validera koncept
   

  

 Önskad profil
   

  

**Vi söker en person som har:**
 God förståelse för IT-system som används i stridsnära miljöer för planering, genomförande och uppföljning av militära insatser
   

  

 Erfarenhet av systemarkitektur och plattformsbaserad utveckling
   

  

 Förmåga att analysera och värdera tekniska plattformar i relation till verksamhetskrav
   

  

 Ett pragmatiskt och hands-on arbetssätt med erfarenhet av prototyper och proof-of-concept
   

  

 Förmåga att kombinera ett helhetsperspektiv med konkret implementation
   

  

 Vi tror att kunskap byggs genom att lära genom att göra. Därför söker vi en person som kan förena strategiskt tänkande med praktiskt utvecklingsarbete och demonstratorframtagning.
   

  

**Övrig information**
 Arbetsmodell: På plats
   

  

 Uppdragsperiod: 2026-03-13 till Öppet
   

  

**Sista ansökningsdag :** 
 2026-03-12
   

  

 Ansök genom att bifoga ditt CV (vi vill inte ha något personligt brev) och besvara urvalsfrågorna. Frågorna utgår från kravprofilen för den här rekryteringen och dina svar ligger till grund för det urval som sker i processen. Att besvara frågorna är en förutsättning för att din ansökan ska anses komplett.
   

  

 Vänligen notera att krav och eventuella meriter ska vara uppfyllda vid ansökningstillfället.

title: Fullstack utvecklare
description:
**Om Vimla!** 




 Är du en nyfiken fullstack-utvecklare som vill jobba i en teknikdriven miljö och göra skillnad för hundratusentals aktiva användare? Vimla är mobiloperatören, som genom att vara en fristående del av Telenor, kombinerar kraften från en stor organisation med friheten och flexibiliteten i ett litet team. Vi står för att ta kundfokus, enkelhet och schyssthet till en ny nivå på mobilmarknaden och i vårt team. Vi vill att det ska vara enkelt och roligt att vara kund så väl som medarbetare hos oss!
 



  





 Nu har du chansen att joina teamet i rollen som Senior fullstack utvecklare, ta chansen och sök!
 



  





**Vad du kommer att göra** 




 I rollen som Senior Fullstack utvecklare på Vimla kommer du in i en scale-up miljö där du tillsammans med ditt team arbetar i syfte att utveckla och underhålla Vimlas tekniska miljö. Ni står i centrum för att bygga de tekniska förutsättningarna för en helt digital mobiloperatör. Du arbetar tillsammans med ett tight team av utvecklare med passion för teknik och bra stämning. Teamet består av såväl juniora som mer seniora kollegor, vilket medför en kultur av lärande och kunskapsdelning.
 



  





 Inom ramen för rollen kommer du
 


* Bygga och optimera våra API:er
* Förbättra vår CI/CD-pipeline
* Utveckla nya tjänster i vår digitala plattform
* Jobba med skalbarhet i vår molnbaserade miljö



  





 Hos oss får du möjlighet att utmanas, utveckla din kompetens och arbeta med fantastiska och kompetenta kollegor. Om du gillar att ha en möjlighet att påverka vad du jobbar med, en bredd i dina arbetsuppgifter och jobba i ett tight DevOps-team - det här är platsen för dig!
 



  





**Vi söker dig som** 





 Vi ser att du har minst tre års tidigare erfarenheter av utveckling inom Typescript, node backends samt react för frontend. Du har fokus på leverans och säkerställer alltid god kvalitet i slutresultatet och tror att du tidigare har erfarenhet från att designa, bygga och underhålla distribuerade system i en molnbaserad miljö (tex AWS). Vi förutsätter att du kommunicerar obehindrat på svenska.
 



  





 Tech-stack du jobbar med:
 


* Frontend: React, TypeScript, Redux, Jest, Playwright & React Native
* Backend: Node.js, API-utveckling
* Databas: PostgreSQL
* Arbetssätt: Agilt, DevOps, testdriven utveckling (TDD)



  





 Meriterande:
 


* Svelte
* Nginx, shell-scripting (Bash, Nushell)
* QA-arbete
* DevOps & Infrastruktur: Docker, Kubernetes/Docker Swarm, AWS, CI/CD med GitHub Actions



  





 På Vimla så värdesätter vi individer som är angelägna om att lära sig och utveckla sin egen kompetens. Vi förväntar oss inte att du känner till alla teknologier i vår stack, så vi letar främst efter någon med ett tillväxttänk och en vilja att lära sig!
 



  





**Varför du vill jobba på Vimla** 




 Vimla är på en spännande tillväxtresa och möjligheterna att växa och utvecklas tillsammans med oss är enorma. Vi är ett roligt, tight team på runt 40 personer i en egen organisation som har stor frihet. Samtidigt är Vimla en del av Telenor Sverige och använder tryggheten som finns i ett stort bolag.
 



  





**Bra att veta** 




 I den här rekryteringen samarbetar Vimla/Telenor med Experis IT, som har lång erfarenhet av att rekrytera IT-specialister och chefer.
 



  





 Om du har frågor eller vill ha mer information är du välkommen att kontakta rekryteringskonsulterna Anki Snis på
 **anki.snis@se.experis.com** 
 , +46 70-377 59 69, och Carina Eyoma på
 **carina.eyoma@se.experis.com** 
 , +46 73-086 22 75.
 



  





 Urval sker löpande, så skicka in din ansökan så snart som möjligt.
 



  





 Vi ser fram emot att ta del av din ansökan!
 



  





 I enlighet med Telenors policy genomför vi en bakgrundskontroll på slutkandidater i alla rekryteringar.
 



  





 Plats: Stockholm Råsunda

title: Software Developer
description:
*BROMMA is a division of Kalmar, operating under its own brand. BROMMA has been the leading manufacturer of crane spreaders ever since its formation in the 1960s. Today we have, by far, the highest market share of the world’s spreader suppliers. Today, our spreaders are currently in use in 99 of the top-100 ports worldwide.*
*BROMMA sales and service network has a wide-reaching footprint. We are present with own sales offices on all continents, and with an extensive network of agents, we are able to support customers in every country in the world.*
*More information about BROMMA can be found on www.bromma.com*
**Join us and take your career to the next level**
 We are looking for a Software Developer to join our innovative team in Kista and help steer the digitalization of global cargo handling. At Bromma, you’ll work on the complete diagnostic lifecycle, developing the telematic software that serves as the backbone of our digital strategy. If you’re a developer who enjoys solving complex problems in a truly international atmosphere, Bromma offers the perfect space to grow your career and your craft. In this role you will report to our Manager for R&D Cloud and Diagnostics.
   

  

**What Are Your Key Responsibilities**
* Develop and maintain Bromma’s diagnostic and cloud platforms, working on a codebase that is now fully managed and developed in-house.
* Work across the full diagnostic lifecycle, building software for onboard telematics, machine-level diagnostics, and cloud-based prognostics.
* Contribute to full-stack development projects, ranging from handling raw machine data to building out functional user interfaces.
* Collaborate within the R&D Cloud and Diagnostics team, coordinating with internal stakeholders and external vendors to deliver technical solutions.
* Implement Bromma’s digital roadmap, focusing on the practical application of software to improve cargo handling operations.
* Translate technical requirements into reliable, scalable code that supports the performance and monitoring of heavy machinery globally.


**What We Offer You**
*"Respect is how we work — across departments, across borders, across job titles. "*
* Rewards that truly count: We create opportunities for growth through diverse experiences and uphold fair, gender-neutral pay, fostering a culture built on equity, empowerment, and continuous development. We also offer a comprehensive rewards package which combines flexibility, wellness, and recognition.
* Safety that moves us forward: Build your career with a company rooted in safety since the 1940s, ensuring stability and an environment that empowers you to speak and be heard.
* Purpose that drives change: You'll contribute to solutions that transform global trade, creating environmental and operational innovations. You'll be in the driver's seat of ideas, developing digital technologies that set industry standards and position us as the forerunner.
* People who move together: You'll collaborate with people who build lasting relationships through global expertise, connections, and a commitment to sustainability.


 Become part of our global network of 5,300 professionals across 120+ countries, where your work drives innovation, sustainability, and meaningful impact around the world.
   

  

**What You Bring To The Role**
* Experience with AWS and DevOps practices, including working with PostgreSQL or other relational databases.
* Practical knowledge of Spring Boot and Node.js.
* A solid understanding of Linux environments and experience coding in C++ or Java.
* Experience in cloud-backed development with an interest in how software interacts with hardware.
* A B.Sc. degree in a relevant field or equivalent professional work experience.
* Fluency in English (written and spoken); proficiency in Swedish is considered an asset.


**Ready to elevate your career? Apply today!**
**Join us and take the next step in your career journey with Bromma!** 
 As the interviews may begin before the closing date, we encourage early applications. Please submit your CV in English.
   

  

 We support hybrid work arrangements, offering flexibility to balance office and remote work but don’t provide relocation support.
   

  

**For further information** 
 please contact Joel Ek Kanslätt, Manager for R&D Cloud and Diagnostics by phone +46 70 200 04 58 or e-mail: joel.ek.kanslatt@bromma.com.
   

  

 Closing Date: 8/3/2026
   

  

 #Bromma
   

  

*Bromma is part of Kalmar.*
**About Kalmar**
*Kalmar (Nasdaq Helsinki: KALMAR) is moving goods in critical supply chains around the world, with the vision to be the forerunner in sustainable material handling equipment and services. The company offers a wide range of industry shaping heavy material handling equipment and services to ports and terminals, distribution centres, manufacturing and heavy logistics. Headquartered in Helsinki, Finland, Kalmar operates globally in over 120 countries and employs approximately 5,300 people. In 2025, the company's sales totalled approximately EUR 1.7 billion. www.kalmarglobal.com*

title: Mainframe Developer
description:
**This role includes:** 








 · Create, plan and design solutions for new Cobol applications
 



 · Implement, test and release new applications in production
 



 · Analyse and develop existing services in our integration layer
 



 · Track, analyse and help solving production incidents
 



 · Become part of an experienced development team with a good atmosphere and many experienced colleagues
 



 · Learn Company's new payment infrastructure and become a key resource in delivering our roadmap of future payment products
 



 · Work in a SAFe agile environment
 



 · Collaborate with other experienced teams and constantly improve our ways of working
 







**Skills and knowledge needed in the role:**

 · Knowledge about Changeman, DB2, IBM Z/OS, JCL, MQ messaging
 



 · Basic understanding of cloud environments and microservice architecture

 · Experience from one or several payment products, such as file-based payments, clearing and settlement systems or similar is helpful
 



 · An open, collaborative attitude and willingness to explore new areas
 



 · An interest to stay up-to-date with the latest industry trends and best practices
 



 · Proficiency in English, spoken and written

title: Fullstack-utvecklare
description:
Till HiQ söker vi nu erfarna Fullstack-utvecklare som vill vara med och skapa innovativa och användarvänliga lösningar för våra kunder. I rollen kommer du fokusera på backend-utveckling och bidra till projekt som gör skillnad för samhället. Du blir en viktig del av ett kompetent team där ni tillsammans hanterar utvecklingen av framtidens digitala tjänster.
   

  

**Om rollen:**
 Som Fullstack-utvecklare kommer du främst att arbeta med backend-utveckling, men även ha möjlighet att bidra med frontend-kompetens när det behövs. Vi söker dig som har erfarenhet av:
   

  

* Backend: Java (Spring, Spring Boot) eller .NET/C#
* Frontend: Javascript/Typescript (React.js, Vue.js eller Angular)
* Molnlösningar: AWS, GCP eller Azure


 Du kommer att delta i hela utvecklingsprocessen från design och utveckling till test och driftsättning, samt bidra med tekniskt innovativa lösningar.
   

  

**Vi söker dig som har:**
* Minst 5 års erfarenhet av fullstack-utveckling
* Ingenjörsexamen i datateknik, teknisk fysik, elektroteknik eller motsvarande
* Svenskt medborgarskap och är flytande i svenska och engelska


**Meriterande:**
* Erfarenhet av DevOps: Docker, Kubernetes och CI/CD-pipelines
* Erfarenhet av molnplattformar (AWS, Azure, GCP)


**Vi erbjuder dig**
* Utmanande uppdrag både ute i våra kunders organisationer samt i vår egen regi, där HiQ har helhetsansvar för projekten.
* Möjlighet att delta i och leda utvecklingen av våra kunders framtida tjänster som förenklar människors vardag
* Kunniga kollegor som gärna delar med sig av sina kunskaper och erfarenheter
* En kreativ arbetsmiljö med möjlighet att utvecklas som människa, kollega och bli bättre på det du redan är bäst på!
* Du blir en del av ett värderingsstyrt bolag som värdesätter glädje och gemenskap och hittar på mycket roligt tillsammans.


**Varför HiQ**
 Sedan 1995 har HiQ varit konsultbolaget som förenklat världen för både kunder och slutanvändare med hjälp av teknik, design och kommunikation. HiQ har alltid fokuserat på två saker: att ha kul på jobbet och att leverera lösningar utöver förväntningar - det är vad som driver oss framåt! Vi HiQare är stolta över att ha en kultur som präglas av
 **resultat** 
 ,
 **ansvar, enkelhet** 
 och
 **glädje** 
 . Vi tror på att arbeta tillsammans för att nå våra gemensamma mål och strävar efter att hjälpa varandra att fortsätta växa och utvecklas. Hos oss får du utöver chansen att utveckla din egen kompetens också möjlighet att lära, leda och inspirera dina kollegor.
   

  

*I denna rekrytering tillämpar vi löpande urval och tjänsten kan komma att tillsättas innan ansökningstiden har gått ut. För att göra rekryteringsprocessen så rättvis och objektiv som möjligt kommer det att ingå urvalsfrågor, intervjuer, tekniska tester, referenstagning och bakgrundskontroll. Varmt välkommen med din ansökan!*

title: BI Developer
description:
**About WPP Media**
 WPP is the creative transformation company. We use the power of creativity to build better futures for our people, planet, clients and communities. For more information, visit wpp.com.
   

  

 WPP Media is WPP’s global media collective. In a world where media is everywhere and in everything, we bring the best platform, people, and partners together to create limitless opportunities for growth. For more information, visit wppmedia.com.
   

  

**Role**
 At WPP Media, we believe in the power of our culture and our people. It’s what elevates us to deliver exceptional experiences for both our clients and each other. In this role it will be critical to embrace WPP & WPP Media’s shared core values:
   

  

* Be Extraordinary by Leading Collectively to Inspire transformational Creativity.
* Create an Open environment by Balancing People and Client Experiences by Cultivating Trust.
* Lead Optimistically by Championing Growth and Development to Mobilize the Enterprise.


**Role Summary And Impact**
 As a BI Developer at WPP Media, you will build and maintain Power BI solutions that help our specialists and clients follow up on media performance. The role is centered around developing user-friendly dashboards, establishing robust data streams, and creating well-structured data models that enable reliable reporting at scale. You’ll translate business needs into technical BI solutions and work closely with engineers, Data Scientists, client teams, and customers - often integrating outputs from different measurement and analytics projects (e.g., MMM, attribution, and other studies) into clear, actionable reporting.
   

  

**Requirements**
**Skills and Experience**
* Bachelor’s degree (or equivalent experience) in Engineering, Computer Science, or a related field
* Experience building and maintaining Power BI solutions, both independently and together with others
* Good knowledge of SQL
* Experience working in a cloud environment, preferably Google Cloud/BigQuery
* Understanding of how data flows and data models are set up to support stable reporting
* Swedish: good understanding in speech and writing
* English: fluent in speech and writing


**Meriting**
* Experience with data modeling and data integration
* Knowledge of DAXs and/or Python
* Experience from media/marketing environments (e.g., agency, publisher, platform)
* Knowledge of digital marketing and media measurement
* Experience working with or visualising outputs from measurement projects (e.g., MMM, attribution)


**Life At WPP Media & Benefits**
 Our passion for shaping the next era of media includes investing in our employees to help them do their best work, and we’re just as committed to employee growth as we are to responsible media investment. WPP Media employees can tap into the global WPP Media & WPP networks to pursue their passions, grow their networks, and learn at the cutting edge of marketing and advertising.
   

  

 In Sweden, our benefits include a SEK 3,000 wellness allowance, a 37,5-hour workweek, half-days and “klämdagar" off, 30 days of vacation, and two paid volunteer days per year. WPP Media Sweden is a member of Almega, and all employees are covered by a collective bargaining agreement (kollektivavtal), which ensures occupational pension, insurance, and other negotiated terms. We host regular team activities, knowledge-sharing sessions, and wellness initiatives throughout the year.
   

  

 WPP Media is an equal opportunity employer and considers applicants for all positions without discrimination or regard to particular characteristics. We are committed to fostering a culture of respect in which everyone feels they belong and has the same opportunities to progress in their careers. We believe the best work happens when we're together, fostering creativity, collaboration, and connection. That's why we’ve adopted a hybrid approach, with teams in the office around four days a week. If you require accommodations or flexibility, please discuss this with the hiring team during the interview process.
   

  

**Application**
 This is a full-time permanent position with a start date as soon as possible. We apply a six-month probationary period. In addition to reviewing your CV and conducting interviews, our recruitment process includes a testing phase. Selection and interviews are ongoing, so please submit your application with your CV and cover letter as soon as possible.
   

  

 We believe that diverse perspectives make us stronger and encourage applications from people of all genders, backgrounds, and experiences.
   

  

**Contact**
 If you have questions about the position, feel free to contact Viktor Åhlén, Head of Operations & Engineering viktor.ahlen@choreograph.com. Due to GDPR, we do not accept applications via email.
   

  

 Please read our Privacy Notice for more information on how we process the information you provide.
