title: Senior Security Specialist
description:
We are seeking an experienced and driven Senior Security Specialist to join our Security Assurance & Compliance Management team. In this role, you will help strengthen and evolve our security posture across a rapidly changing telecom landscape. You will work closely with cross-functional teams, providing expert guidance on secure architecture, risk mitigation, and industry-leading best practices.


As a Senior Security Specialist, you will support both strategic and operational security initiatives, with a primary focus on mobile core network environments, while also covering broader telecom domains such as RAN, Transport, OSS, and Telco Cloud.


**What** **you’ll** **do** **:**

You will drive and support security initiatives across mobile core and broader telecom domains, ensuring robust and resilient telecom operations through expert assessments, governance, and collaboration.


* Drive and support security initiatives across mobile core and broader telecom domains, including security assessments
* Provide expert input on secure architectural designs, technology decisions, and conduct risk assessments, threat modelling, and security reviews
* Support sourcing with security requirements (primarily ISO 27000 alignment), perform supplier security audits, and represent the security function in internal and external forums
* Provide expert support across the organization on security matters related to Virtualization, Operating Systems, Applications, Networking, Architecture, Telia Policies, Encryption, Access Controls, and Backup, including support in handling and resolving security incidents , investigations etc.
**What will help you thrive in this role** **:**

You bring strong analytical and problem-solving abilities, excellent communication skills with the ability to simplify complex security topics, and a collaborative, proactive, solution-oriented approach. You are able to work independently, manage multiple priorities, and collaborate effectively with other security experts and cross-functional teams including Network, IT, Legal, Privacy, and Operations.


* 7+ years of experience in the Telecom Industry, preferably with a strong background in mobile core networks and telco cloud
* Proven track record within Security, including operational and/or architectural contributions
* Security Certified Auditor credential (CISA, CISSP) or equivalent security certification
* Architectural understanding of telecom environments, including interfaces, protocols, and end-to-end ecosystem interactions
* Solid knowledge in IT technologies, including networking, infrastructure, virtualization, and cloud native concepts
* Technical degree (Engineering, Computer Science, Telecommunications, or similar) and relevant certifications such as CISSP.
**Join us to shape smarter living for people, businesses, and the planet**

At Telia, we’re a team of 1 5 00 0 colleagues across the Nordics and Baltics, passionate about technology and connectivity. As a **Leading** **Telecommunications Operator** & **Climate** **L** **eader** , we drive change with large-scale, impactful projects while building a sustainable, inclusive world. Here, you can **grow your skills, lead meaningful projects, and thrive in a supportive, diverse environment.** Whether you’re taking your first step or your next, Telia is a place to grow, belong, and make a real impact.


**What we offer**

When you join us, you'll receive a comprehensive benefits package tailored to your local market, opportunities for remote work, and more. You'll also have the chance to earn a bonus based on your performance and Telia's results.


**For Lithuanian applicants only: monthly salary range for this position is from** **4300** **to** **6400** **EUR (gross) + annual performance bonuses** . Although it may vary depending on your skills and experience.


**Ready to make** **better** **happen?**

We look forward to receiving your application by **2026-0** **3** **-** **03** **.** Please note that we might close the position earlier if we find the right candidate, so don’t wait too long to apply!


If you’re selected for the next stage, you’ll be contacted by our Hiring Manager/Talent Acquisition Partner. Background and reference checks will be part of the process .


**Equal opportunities**

At Telia, we recogniz e talent by professional skills and growth potential. We champion diversity, ensuring every individual’s needs are met, regardless of disability, gender, age, nationality, sexual orientation, or social status. Together, we’re dedicated to fostering an inclusive work environment where your uniqueness is our strength.


**Join us and** **let’s** **make better happen** **-** **together** **!**

title: Principal Engineer -Public Edge Infrastructure
description:
Engineering · Stockholm, Milan · Full-time · 1,076,536kr SEK - 1,248,781kr SEK
  
What you will do

* Design, build, and operate Klarna’s global edge and public infrastructure to support highly available, low-latency services at massive scale
* Lead initiatives to standardize how public-facing services are exposed, secured, and routed globally using edge-native capabilities
	+ *For example: defining reusable patterns so services can be made globally available with minimal bespoke configuration*
* Own and evolve edge security and delivery using AWS CloudFront and AWS Web Application Firewall (WAF)
	+ *For example: strengthening baseline protection against abuse while keeping latency low for real users*
* Reduce architectural complexity by simplifying traffic flows and removing unnecessary intermediaries
	+ *For example: enabling more direct, edge-to-service communication paths*
* Improve observability of public infrastructure across systems
	+ *For example: making it easy to understand how public entrypoints behave and how they relate to backend services*
* Collaborate with frontend and platform teams on edge-driven performance initiatives
	+ *For example: caching, prerendering, or similar techniques that move lightweight logic closer to users*


Who you are

* A specialist in edge or public infrastructure with deep, hands-on experience in AWS CloudFront and AWS Web Application Firewall (WAF)
* Strong understanding of global traffic management, caching, TLS, routing, and failure modes at scale
* Experienced in designing resilient and secure architectures for critical customer-facing systems
* Experienced in security and traffic protection at the edge
	+ *For example: bot mitigation, rate limiting, or abuse prevention using WAF capabilities*
* Strong hands-on experience with infrastructure-as-code AWS Cloud Development Kit (CDK) and Terraform, with the expectation to work with both
* Programming language: TypeScript
* Comfortable working with serverless and managed cloud services such as AWS S3, AWS Lambda, and AWS Step Functions
* Able to reason about both infrastructure and application concerns
	+ For example: understanding how frontend behavior, backend services, and edge configuration interact
* Collaborative, pragmatic, and motivated by reducing complexity while increasing reliability


Awesome to have


These are areas you might have experience in, or be interested in growing into over time.* Experience with frontend engineering and modern frameworks such as React
	+ For example: working with Server-Side Rendering (SSR), hydration, or performance-sensitive rendering paths
* Knowledge of web performance optimisation techniques
	+ For example: reducing time-to-first-byte or improving perceived load through caching and streaming
* Familiarity with edge execution or serverless request-handling models
	+ For example: running lightweight logic closer to users
* Experience building or operating observability solutions for large-scale distributed systems


Please include a CV in English.
Curious to learn more about Klarna and what it’s like to work here? Explore our career site!

title: Services Sales Director Sweden
description:
Job Description:
**Join Our Team as Services Sales Director in Sweden!**  

Step into a role where you shape sales strategy and bring service offerings to customers.
As our Services Sales Director in Sweden, you will lead a talented team of Services Sales Representatives. Your mission will be to develop a high-performance team while managing some key accounts and opportunities yourself. **What drives us at Schneider Electric?**  

For us, impact isn’t just a term paraded across posters or social media; it’s encoded into our culture. After all, Schneider makes companies, infrastructure, buildings, homes, data centers, and entire industries more efficient and sustainable. With us, you’ll contribute to tackling the climate crisis head-on, and accelerating the energy transition the planet urgently needs. There’s a reason why we’re consistently ranked among the most sustainable companies in the world. Here, you can pursue your dream career while actively making a long-term, positive impact on the planet. With us, you’ll contribute to tackling the climate crisis head-on, and accelerating the energy transition the planet urgently needs. What’s more, we help tens of millions of people in underserved communities gain access to energy and education — so you’re making the world a fairer place, too. You’ll sit among colleagues with vastly different personal and professional backgrounds, all united by a vision of a better world. **What you’ll do**  

* Lead the team of Services Sales Representatives & act as a people manager according to our values & leadership code
* Drive sales excellence across account management and pipeline management
* Build the growth strategic plan, including both vision and sales execution roadmap for Services in Sweden
* Convert services leads from the Installed base into business opportunities
* Drive transformation towards a digital, consultative business approach.
* Collaborate closely with other sales, tendering, business support and operations teams in Sweden and the Nordic Zone
* Articulate the consistency of all Service offers all along the life cycles stages, positioning as a top priority our recurring revenue through service contracts
* Contribute to Country Plan for Global Accounts and Targeted Accounts
* Manage Service offer pricing based on margin expectations.

 **Essential for the Role**  

* Commercial mindset with strong drive and interest in technology; able to learn new technologies quickly at a general level
* Prior success in achieving sales targets and developing long-term customer partnerships
* Solid experience from Energy or IT industry, especially in customer-facing roles and within sales
* Ability to build lasting customer relationships at all levels (partners, end users, C-level)
* Basic technical understanding from segments such as Cloud & Service Provider, Power & Grid as well as overall knowledge of software, digital transformation, and solution services.
* Experience from Medium Voltage, Low Voltage, UPS, Cooling or Industrial Automation is beneficial
* Strong written, verbal, and visual communication skills
* Language skills: fluent English
* Able to work effectively with internal and external stakeholders and build relationships across business units and lead teams to success

 **Why Schneider Electric?**  

**Flexibility:** With our Global Flexibility at Work policy, and our hybrid work model, we empower our employees for their work-life integration.**Career Development:** We provide a rich environment for our people to grow and learn every day through our career development model.**Good Benefits:** Schneider Electric offers a robust benefits package to support our employees such as paid family leave, a culture of wellness and much more.
Inclusive Environment: We build a culture of respect where everyone feels safe to be their authentic selves. We are fully committed to inclusion, and our policies and culture reflect this commitment **So, what’s Next?**  

If you’re ready to take on a high-impact role in a dynamic environment, we’d love to hear from you. Apply now and help us shape the future of industrial project management. **Where can I find out more?**
About Schneider Electric: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VbldHPFltQQ
About Our Company: **Looking to make an IMPACT with your career?**


When you are thinking about joining a new team, culture matters. At Schneider Electric, our values and behaviors are the foundation for creating a great culture to support business success. We believe that our IMPACT values – Inclusion, Mastery, Purpose, Action, Curiosity, Teamwork – starts with us.


IMPACT is also your invitation to join Schneider Electric where you can contribute to turning sustainability ambition into actions, no matter what role you play. It is a call to connect your career with the ambition of achieving a more resilient, efficient, and sustainable world.


We are looking for IMPACT Makers; exceptional people who turn sustainability ambitions into actions at the intersection of automation, electrification, and digitization. We celebrate IMPACT Makers and believe everyone has the potential to be one.


Become an IMPACT Maker with Schneider Electric – apply today!


€36 billion global revenue  

+13% organic growth  

150 000+ employees in 100+ countries  

#1 on the Global 100 World’s most sustainable corporations

  

You must submit an online application to be considered for any position with us. This position will be posted until filled. *Schneider Electric aspires to be the most inclusive and caring company in the world, by providing equitable opportunities to everyone, everywhere, and ensuring all employees feel uniquely valued and safe to contribute their best. We mirror the diversity of the communities in which we operate, and ‘inclusion’ is one of our core values. We believe our differences make us stronger as a company and as individuals and we are committed to championing inclusivity in everything we do.*  

*At Schneider Electric, we uphold the highest standards of ethics and compliance, and we believe that trust is a foundational value. Our Trust Charter is our Code of Conduct and demonstrates our commitment to ethics, safety, sustainability, quality and cybersecurity, underpinning every aspect of our business and our willingness to behave and respond respectfully and in good faith to all our stakeholders. You can find out more about our Trust Charter* *here*  

  

*Schneider Electric is an Equal Opportunity Employer. It is our policy to provide equal employment and advancement opportunities in the areas of recruiting, hiring, training, transferring, and promoting all qualified individuals regardless of race, religion, color, gender, disability, national origin, ancestry, age, military status, sexual orientation, marital status, or any other legally protected characteristic or conduct.*

title: Lead AWS Engineer (Global Edge Infrastructure Specialist)
description:
**About Justera Group**

  

Justera Group AB is a leading Swedish IT consulting firm with great experience specializing in building high-performing technology teams and delivering end-to-end IT solutions. Led by dynamic female executives, Justera Group focuses on helping businesses harness the power of digital technologies to continuously evolve in today’s rapidly changing economy. The company has deep expertise in IT consultancy, software development, and recruitment services, providing clients with purpose-driven, well-trained consultants who consistently deliver efficient and effective results. Justera Group manages the entire talent lifecycle, from hiring to ongoing management, ensuring the right fit for each project on time and within budget. With their strong commitment to quality, collaboration, and client success, Justera Group is a trusted partner for technology innovation across Sweden.  

  

**About the Role:**

  

This role requires deep hands-on expertise in designing, operating, and securing large-scale internet-facing infrastructure on AWS, where performance, resilience, and cyber security are business-critical.


The consultant will play a key role in standardizing and scaling edge architecture, ensuring high availability during extreme traffic peaks, and protecting services from security threats at global scale.


This is not a general backend or observability role. The focus is production-grade Global Edge delivery and protection of high-traffic web platforms.

**Key Responsibilities:**

* Design, implement, and operate global edge architecture using AWS services
* Own and optimize CloudFront distributions for high-traffic, latency-sensitive web applications
* Design and manage AWS WAF security controls, including rule development, tuning, and threat mitigation
* Build and maintain infrastructure using AWS Cloud Development Kit (CDK) in TypeScript
* Improve platform resilience, scalability, and performance across global regions
* Implement protections against large-scale attacks (e.g. DDoS, traffic spikes, abusive patterns)
* Analyze traffic behavior and continuously optimize caching, routing, and security policies
* Contribute to standardization and automation of global public infrastructure
* Collaborate closely with engineering teams to support secure and performant delivery of web applications

 **Requirements:**

**Global Edge Infrastructure (Deep Hands-On)**

* Proven ownership of **large-scale public web infrastructure running globally**
* Experience operating platforms with **very high traffic volumes and strict uptime requirements**
* Demonstrated work with **performance optimization, resilience engineering, and traffic surge handling**
* Real production experience managing **security events at the edge**

**AWS Edge Services**

* Expert-level experience with **CloudFront** in production environments


	+ Distribution design and optimization
	+ Caching strategies and origin architecture
	+ Performance tuning and troubleshooting
* Expert-level experience with **AWS WAF**


	+ Rule design and lifecycle management
	+ Threat detection and mitigation
	+ Security hardening for internet-facing services

**Infrastructure as Code & Engineering**

* Strong hands-on experience with **AWS CDK**
* **TypeScript as primary engineering language**
* Ability to design and maintain infrastructure programmatically at scale

**Production Ownership**

* Experience running mission-critical services where edge infrastructure directly impacts business outcomes
* Experience supporting major traffic events (e.g. campaigns, peak seasons, global launches)
* Strong operational mindset with incident handling and continuous improvement

**Highly Valuable Experience**

* Operating high-volume commercial or consumer-facing web platforms
* Edge performance engineering and latency optimization
* Advanced caching strategies and origin shielding
* Security engineering at CDN / edge layer
* Automation and standardization of public infrastructure at scale

**Profile Characteristics**

* Deep specialist rather than generalist cloud engineer
* Strong engineering mindset with real production accountability
* Comfortable working in highly mature technical environments with expert peers
* Able to operate independently in complex global infrastructure landscapes

* **Start date: 09.03.2026**
* **Language:** **English/Full professional**
* **Seniority: Senior**

 **What We Offer:**

* A dynamic and innovative workplace driving advancements in cutting-edge robotic technologies
* The opportunity to collaborate with talented cross-functional teams on meaningful and impactful projects
* Competitive compensation and comprehensive benefits package
* A supportive culture that fosters continuous learning, growth, and professional development
* Flexible hybrid working model for an optimal work-life balance
* 25 days of annual leave to recharge and relax
* An annual wellness allowance of 3,500 SEK to support your health and wellbeing

title: Event Marketeer
description:
##### **Om rollen**


Brinner du för marknadsföring och att skapa content som fångar uppmärksamhet, bygger relationer och driver verkliga resultat? Har du redan testat dina vingar inom digital marknadsföring, kommunikation och sociala medier och står nu i ett vägskäl redo att ta nästa steg i en roll där din kommunikation når tusentals människor?


Vi på Easyfairs Nordic söker en Event Marketeer som vill vara med och skapa engagerande kommunikation för två av Sveriges största och mest inflytelserika event: **Ekonomi & Företag** och **Personal & Chef.** Här får du arbeta med marknadsföring som märks på riktigt – från första kampanj till fulla eventgolv med engagerade besökare och utställare.


Easyfairs är en av Europas ledande eventarrangörer och driver några av Nordens viktigaste eventarenor, inklusive Kistamässan och Malmömässan.

##### **Din roll – skapa content som når rätt målgrupp och driver engagemang**


I rollen som Event Marketeer ansvarar du för att planera, skapa och optimera marknadsföring som driver räckvidd, engagemang och konvertering. Du arbetar nära projektledare, säljteam och innehållsspecialister och spelar en central roll i hur våra event kommuniceras och upplevs.


Du kommer att:

* Skapa engagerande content för sociala medier, webb, nyhetsbrev och kampanjer
* Planera och genomföra marknadsaktiviteter som driver trafik, registreringar och deltagande
* Anpassa budskap och innehåll för olika målgrupper och kanaler
* Säkerställa att kommunikationen är relevant, träffsäker och varumärkesbyggande
* Analysera resultat, följa upp kampanjer och optimera innehåll baserat på data
* Bidra till att utveckla och stärka våra event genom strategisk och kreativ marknadsföring. Du arbetar både strategiskt och operativt – från idé och innehållsskapande till publicering, analys och optimering.
  



##### **Kvalifikationer**


Du har redan börjat bygga din kompetens inom marknadsföring och känner dig trygg i att skapa innehåll som engagerar och når ut. Du förstår hur man kommunicerar effektivt i digitala kanaler och hur content bidrar till affärsresultat.

##### **Vi söker dig som:**

* Har en eftergymnasial utbildning inom marknadsföring, kommunikation eller liknande
* Har erfarenhet av digital marknadsföring, content creation och resultatdrivet arbete i sociala medier
* Har förmåga att skapa engagerande och målgruppsanpassat innehåll
* Är en duktig storyteller
* Kan arbeta självständigt och driva ditt arbete framåt
* Innehar grundläggande kunskaper i content- och designverktyg som Canva eller Adobe Creative Cloud. Datadriven marknadsföring och kampanjuppföljning
* Talar och skriver obehindrat på svenska och engelska
##### **Meriterande är erfarenhet av:**

* WordPress och SEO
* Marknadsföring i verktyg så som Salesforce Marketing Cloud eller HubSpot
* Google Marketing Platform (GA4, Looker, Search Console)
* Eventmarknadsföring eller B2B-kommunikation
##### **Din personlighet – nyfiken, kreativ och resultatorienterad**

  

För att lyckas i rollen tror vi att du:

* Har ett starkt intresse för marknadsföring och kommunikation
* Gillar att skapa content som engagerar och skapar värde
* Är nyfiken och vill utvecklas inom digital marknadsföring
* Tar initiativ och driver ditt arbete framåt
* Trivs i ett högt tempo och en dynamisk miljö
* Gillar att samarbeta och bidra till teamets framgång
  

Vi värdesätter din drivkraft, kreativitet och vilja att utvecklas minst lika mycket som din erfarenhet.

##### **Om Easyfairs**


Hos oss får du vara en del av en organisation som satsar på:

* engagerade medarbetare
* smart teknik
* starka varumärken

Våra värderingar är **kreativt entreprenörskap**, **integritet**, **resultatfokus** och att vi **alltid ska ha kul tillsammans** – under planeringen såväl som när vi öppnar dörrarna till våra event.

title: Lead Architect
description:
#### **About the Role**


We are looking for a **Lead Architect** to define and drive the technical vision for our entire technology stack. As the senior authority on architecture, you will set principles, patterns, and standards that guide our engineering teams while enabling them to deliver efficiently and reliably.


This role partners closely with the Head of Platform Engineering to ensure that architectural decisions are operationally feasible, scalable, and aligned with business needs. You will also collaborate with software Architects to implement best practices, frameworks, and patterns across our systems.

#### **What You’ll Do**

**Architectural Vision**

* Define and maintain the end-to-end target architecture across all systems and domains: backend, frontend, data, QA, and infrastructure.
* Establish architecture principles, patterns, and standards that guide development across all teams.
* Maintain architectural artifacts, including system diagrams, architectural decision records, and reference architectures.

**Cross-Team Alignment**

* Collaborate with Software Architects to ensure technical coherence across all domains.
* Review and challenge major design proposals to ensure consistent, high-quality technical decisions.
* Partner with Engineering Managers to ensure architecture is applied consistently across product teams.

**Technical Leadership & Mentorship**

* Serve as a trusted advisor to Software Architects, Engineering Managers, and senior engineers.
* Mentor teams on design patterns, best practices, and long-term maintainability.
* Evaluate emerging technologies and frameworks, recommending adoption or deprecation as appropriate.

**Governance & Communication**

* Lead or advise on technical forums, architecture boards, and design reviews.
* Ensure architectural decisions balance innovation, scalability, and operational constraints.
* Advocate for technical excellence while empowering teams to execute independently.

#### **What Success Looks Like**

* Architecture is consistent and adhered to across teams.
* Systems are maintainable, scalable, and of high quality.
* Software Architects’ practices are adopted effectively across engineering.
* Architectural decisions are implemented with minimal operational rework.
* Architecture aligns with platform, cloud, and developer experience capabilities.

#### **Who You Are**

* Deep experience across full-stack systems, including backend (.NET), frontend (React), cloud (Azure), Data (MS Fabric) and 3rd party integrations.
* Strong technical judgment with clear opinions on target architecture and best practices.
* Skilled at influencing multiple teams and senior technical leaders without direct authority.
* Experienced in mentoring, designing, and reviewing complex systems.
* Familiar with modern software architecture patterns: microservices, Clean Architecture, domain-driven design, and cloud-first practices.

#### **Who You’ll Work With**

* **Software Architects (Backend/Frontend/QA/Data):** Guide domain-level technical decisions.
* **Engineering Managers & Product Managers:** Provide architectural guidance and review cross-team designs.
* **Head of Platform Engineering:** Ensure operational feasibility and platform alignment.
* **CTO:** Partner on strategic technology direction.

title: Power Platform Governance-konsult
description:
Som **Power Platform Governance konsult** på B3 Cloud kommer att säkerställa governance och compliance i våra kunders användning av Power Platform. Du fokuserar på säkerhet, datakvalitet och effektiva arbetsflöden, samtidigt som du ger stöd och råd till kunder när det behövs.

*Du kommer bland annat:*

* Säkerställa **governance och compliance** inom Power Platform hos våra kunder, inklusive miljöer, datakvalitet och säkerhet.
* Granska lösningar och flöden för att säkerställa **säkerhet, regelverk och kvalitet**.
* Upprätta och underhålla **riktlinjer, policys och best practices** för utveckling och automatisering i Power Apps, Power Automate och Dataverse.
* Identifiera och föreslå förbättringar av **processer och arbetsflöden** för att minimera risker och maximera effektivitet.
* **Vägleda och stötta** kunder i frågor som rör governance, säkerhet och best practices inom Power Platform

*Vi söker dig som:*

* Har minst **5 års erfarenhet** av **governance, säkerhet, compliance eller miljöhantering** i molnlösningar, gärna Microsoft 365 och Azure
* **Innehar god förståelse för Power Platform** (Power Apps, Power Automate, Dataverse) och hur man styr och förvaltar plattformen på organisationsnivå
* Kan analysera, granska och följa upp lösningar för **riskhantering och kvalitetssäkring**
* Är **kundfokuserad, lösningsorienterad** och **tar initiativ** för att förbättra och utveckla processer
* Kan **flytande svenska i tal och skrift** då det krävs i det dagliga arbetet
**Vilka är vi?**


Vi är B3 Cloud, ett härligt gäng med specialistkunskaper inom molntjänster utspridda i Göteborg och Stockholm. Vi tror på att dela kunskap, stötta varandra och ständigt utvecklas tillsammans – både som team och som individer.


Som en del av B3 Consulting Group har vi resurser, kompetens och stöd i ryggen samtidigt som vi bibehåller dynamik och flexibilitet med korta beslutsvägar. Vi är stolt över att vara del av en verksamhet som präglas av inkludering och en strävan efter att ha en positiv påverkan på samhället, människor och miljön. Vi värdesätter olikheter och erfarenheter och arbetar kontinuerligt med inkludering och kultur för samarbete och respekt.

*Vi erbjuder:*

* **Frihet och flexibilitet** att påverka din utveckling, arbetstider och uppdrag
* **Kompetensutveckling** genom utbildningar, certifieringar och lunchföreläsningar
* **Konkurrenskraftig lönemodell** och en otroligt flexibel samt förmånlig RAM modell.
* **En givande företagskultur** med konferensresor, AW:s och wellness-aktiviteter

title: Receptionist
description:
**Arbeta mitt i city nära Saltsjön i en maritim atmosfär!**



Scandic Sjöfartshotellet har ett centralt läge på Södermalm och är den perfekta utgångspunkten för de som vill upptäcka Stockholm. Våra gäster kan shoppa i unika butiker eller ta Djurgårdsfärjan till Skansen och Vasamuseet eller utforska Gamla Stans gränder och titta på Högvakten vid slottet. Efter att ha utforskat stadens sevärdheter kan våra gäster koppla av i bastun eller rensa hjärnan i gymmet. Om vädret tillåter serveras även mat och dryck på vår takterrass, med en fantastisk utsikt över Saltsjön.



Vi som arbetar på Sjöfartshotellet är ett sammansvetsat team som samarbetar och har god gemenskap. Hos oss man har roligt på jobbet varje dag. Nu söker vi dig som vill vara med oss och skapa oförglömliga upplevelser för våra gäster!


**Nu söker vi en Receptionist till Scandic Sjöfartshotellet, 20%, varannan helg**



Oavsett varför gästen kommer till oss är det få saker som är så uppskattade som ett vänligt ansikte som hälsar välkommen. Som Service Host agerar du värd tillsammans med övriga teamet på hotellet och skapar en gästupplevelse i världsklass.



I rollen som Receptionist arbetar du inom ett eller flera ansvarsområden som alla bidrar till gästens helhetsupplevelse. Under din tid hos oss kan dessa områden variera i takt med att du och affären utvecklas. Hos oss får du ta ett stort eget ansvar för att ta de beslut som krävs för att göra gästen nöjd och teamen utvecklar och förbättrar arbetssätt och service i takt med att omvärlden förändras. Vi är nämligen övertygade om att det är när du får utvecklas och bidra med all din kompetens och erfarenhet som vi överträffar gästens förväntningar. På köpet får vi kul på jobbet!



Så ta med dig dina erfarenheter, ditt engagemang och ditt sätt att tänka till oss – och bidra till en kultur där vi bryr oss på riktigt: om varandra, våra gäster och vår planet. Välkommen till Scandic!


**Vad innebär rollen som Receptionist?**



Du som arbetar inom ansvarsområdet Front of House är ansvarig för att våra gäster får service i världsklass. Du är spindeln i nätet som ser till att gästen alltid är i fokus. Du är den som går igenom ankomstlistan och lägger tid på detaljerna. Ser till att gästens önskemål uppfylls. Du har alltid ett leende på läpparna och en kreativ lösning i bakfickan. Du löser det mesta och är en stjärna på att vända en missnöjd gäst till en nöjd gäst. Din arbetsplats är vår lobby. För det är där du möter flest gäster. I ansvarsområdet ingår även administrativt arbete, säkerhetsarbete och arbete med försäljning.


Arbetet i Front of House innebär att checka in och ut hotellets gäster, hälsa välkommen och ge gästen den information den behöver om sin vistelse. Du hanterar bokningar i systemet Opera Cloud och hanterar administrativa uppgifter runt gäster och säkerhet. Allt arbete sker med gästnöjdhet och försäljning i fokus.


Hotellet har öppet dygnet runt och det är därför viktigt att du trivs med att arbeta i skift (förmiddagar, eftermiddagar och helger).


**Vem är du?**



För att passa i rollen tror vi att du har en väl utvecklad social förmåga och är kapabel att hantera att det händer många olika saker samtidigt. Det är mycket viktigt att du kan förmedla ett gott värdskap till hotellets gäster.



Du har också vana och kunskap i att arbeta med dator som arbetsredskap.


Eftersom arbetet till stor del består av att kommunicera med gäster är goda kunskaper i svenska och engelska en förutsättning. Talar du ytterligare ett språk är det meriterande.


Allra viktigast är dock dina personliga egenskaper och din inställning. För att passa i rollen behöver du vara en lyhörd och prestigelös lagspelare som tar ett stort ansvar för dina arbetsuppgifter och helhetsresultatet.


**Information om tjänsterna**



Tjänsterna är en tillsvidareanställningar på deltid, 20% varannan helg



Vi tar enbart emot ansökningar via vår hemsida. Alla ansökningar kommer att behandlas löpande och tjänsten kan tillsättas innan sista ansökningsdag, varför vi ber dig att ansöka så snart som möjligt. I denna rekrytering använder vi oss av ett enklare test om service vid urvalet.



Vi ser fram emot att välkomna dig till oss på Scandic!



Ps. på vår hemsida kan du läsa mer om vår kultur, vad tjänsten innebär och om våra förmåner!


  
**Vi har riktigt bra förmåner**
-------------------------------

Rabatt när du äter, dricker och övernattar hos oss


Family & Friends rabatt för din familj och vänner


Rabatt hos våra partnerföretag


Pension & försäkringar enligt kollektivavtal


Friskvårdsbidrag


Utbildning och utveckling via interna plattformar


  
Vi når längre när olikheter bejakas. Hos oss får du utrymme att vara dig själv och utvecklas i den riktning du vill, med trygga villkor och schyssta avtal som grund. Ta med dig dina erfarenheter, ditt engagemang och ditt sätt att tänka till oss - bidra till en kultur där vi bryr oss på riktigt: om varandra, våra gäster och vår planet. Välkommen till Scandic.



Delar du våra värderingar?


**BE A PRO** **BE YOU** **BE CARING** **BE BOLD**

  

  

Enable "functional cookies" to watch the video


...uppmuntrar alla att göra skillnad för miljön och att det var en av våra kollegor inom housekeeping som kom på idén om ”häng-upp-handduken”.
...i Sverige blivit rankad som besöksnäringens mest attraktiva arbetsgivare två år i rad, i Visitas årliga undersökning.
... bara serverar kaffe som är ekologiskt och Fairtrade eller UTZ-certifierat.
...tack vare vårt stora miljöengagemang, blivit rankad som branschens mest hållbara arbetsgivare elva år i rad, av Sustainable Brand Index.
...under 2014 inledde ett samarbete med organisationen Real Stars, centrerat kring ”Fair Sex”, dvs. arbete mot människo- och sexhandel.
company_description: Nordiskt hotellföretag i världsklass som skapar enastående upplevelser för de många människorna. 16 000 medarbetar, 280 hotell i 6 länder.

title: Acquisition Sales Representative
description:
Acquisition Sales Representative  



This role has been designed as ‘Hybrid’ with an expectation that you will work on average 2 days per week from an HPE office.**Who We Are:**


Hewlett Packard Enterprise is the global edge-to-cloud company advancing the way people live and work. We help companies connect, protect, analyze, and act on their data and applications wherever they live, from edge to cloud, so they can turn insights into outcomes at the speed required to thrive in today’s complex world. Our culture thrives on finding new and better ways to accelerate what’s next. We know varied backgrounds are valued and succeed here. We have the flexibility to manage our work and personal needs. We make bold moves, together, and are a force for good. If you are looking to stretch and grow your career our culture will embrace you. Open up opportunities with HPE.

**Job Description:**

  



* Do You have the ability to position value?
* Do You have the skill to make complex things easy for others to adopt?
* Do people have trust in You?
* Do You love to sell?
* Do You have some experience from the IT Industry?


Yes to above? Then You are probably our next rock star!


We are strengthening our **Hunt/Acquisition team** with a **Sales Representative**. The mission for this team is to win new customers to HPE. The hunting space is approx. 100 enterprise accounts, in both private and public sector, where HPE see huge potential to grow. You will be part of a team that has been very successful during it´s two years of exist, and which is now levelling up even further.

**Responsibilities:**

* Mapping, structuring and investigate the potential accounts
* Build stakeholder mapping that includes relevant roles
* Prepare and execute on a relevant storytelling that will lead to customer meetings with the right stakeholders
* Establish a professional, working, and consultative, relationship with the potential clients, by developing a core understanding of their unique business needs of the client within their industry.
* Lead the sales process from prospect to closure
* Understand, position and work with our relevant partners
* Quota Retirement
* Interface with both internal and external/industry experts to anticipate customer needs and facilitate solutions development.
* Manage the entire sales process in our CRM/Forecasting tool (Salesforce)

**Education and Experience Required:**

* Typically 2-5 years of experience in IT sales
* Previous work experience with IT Infrastructure Sales (server, storage, network) will be considered a plus
* University or Bachelor's degree preferred, but not required.

**Knowledge and Skills:**

* Hunting mentality
* Never give up attitude
* Self confident and determined to succeed
* Knowledge about product, service, solution and differentiators between own offerings and what competitor's offerings.
* Use knowledge in specialty, and consultative selling skills, to proactively help customers with making IT business decisions.
* Solid communication and presentation skills within IT at the manager level.
* Conceptualizes and articulates well-targeted solutions in area of specialty - product, service, solution - from proposal to contract sign- off.
* Have enough knowledge about a product, service or solution to be able to qualify a deal.
* Maintain knowledge of industry trends, associated solutions, and key partner/ISV solutions.
* Regular use of Salesforce updating deal profile and forecasting accurately as per HPE sales process

**Additional Skills:**


Accountability, Accountability, Active Learning, Active Listening, Assertiveness, Bias, Building Rapport, Buyer Personas, Coaching, Complex Sales, Creativity, Critical Thinking, Cross-Functional Teamwork, Customer Experience Strategy, Customer Interactions, Design Thinking, Empathy, Financial Acumen, Follow-Through, Growth Mindset, Identifying Sales Opportunities, Industry Knowledge, Intellectual Curiosity (Inactive), Long Term Planning, Managing Ambiguity {+ 6 more}**What We Can Offer You:**

**Health & Wellbeing**


We strive to provide our team members and their loved ones with a comprehensive suite of benefits that supports their physical, financial and emotional wellbeing.

**Personal & Professional Development**


We also invest in your career because the better you are, the better we all are. We have specific programs catered to helping you reach any career goals you have — whether you want to become a knowledge expert in your field or apply your skills to another division.

**Unconditional Inclusion**


We are unconditionally inclusive in the way we work and celebrate individual uniqueness. We know varied backgrounds are valued and succeed here. We have the flexibility to manage our work and personal needs. We make bold moves, together, and are a force for good.

**Let's Stay Connected:**


Follow @HPECareers on Instagram to see the latest on people, culture and tech at HPE.

We do not discriminate on the basis of race, gender, or any other protected category, and all decisions we make are made on the basis of qualifications, merit, and business need. Our goal is to be one global team that is representative of our customers, in an inclusive environment where we can continue to innovate and grow together. Please click here: Equal Employment Opportunity.

**Hewlett Packard Enterprise is EEO Protected Veteran/ Individual with Disabilities.**

  



HPE will comply with all applicable laws related to employer use of arrest and conviction records, including laws requiring employers to consider for employment qualified applicants with criminal histories.

  



**No Fees Notice & Recruitment Fraud Disclaimer**

 *It has come to HPE’s attention that there has been an increase in recruitment fraud whereby scammer impersonate HPE or HPE-authorized recruiting agencies and offer fake employment opportunities to candidates. These scammers often seek to obtain personal information or money from candidates.*

 *Please note that Hewlett Packard Enterprise (HPE), its direct and indirect subsidiaries and affiliated companies, and its authorized recruitment* *agencies/vendors* ***will never charge any candidate a registration fee, hiring fee, or any other fee in connection with its recruitment and hiring process.*** *The credentials of any hiring agency that claims to be working with HPE for recruitment of talent should be verified by candidates and candidates shall be solely responsible to conduct such verification. Any candidate/individual who relies on the erroneous representations made by fraudulent employment agencies does so at their own risk, and HPE disclaims liability for any damages or claims that may result from any such communication.*

title: Senior Financial Controller
description:
Vi på Iver brinner för innovationer och god laganda, vi är särskilt intresserad av dig som gillar att tänka nytt och dela med dig av dina tankar. Nu söker vi en Financial Controller som vill driva utveckling, skapa struktur och göra verklig skillnad. Är du vår nya kollega?
  
We empower our Nordic society Iver är en ledande nordisk helhetsleverantör av molnbaserade IT-tjänster med spetskompetens inom drift, cybersäkerhet, cloud och innovation. Våra tjänster är kritiska inte bara för våra kunder utan för digitaliseringen av samhället i stort. Med huvudkontor i Stockholm verkar Iver främst i Norden med en agenda att fortsätta expandera. Iver omsätter drygt 3 miljarder SEK och har cirka 1 300 anställda som arbetar på ett av våra 23 kontor i Norden. Din roll på Iver Vi söker en kollega till Financial control and accounting-teamet som befinner sig i en spännande fas där roller, ansvar, processer och verktyg är under utveckling. Rollen är affärsnära och analytisk med många kontaktytor i organisationen. Du arbetar både med övergripande analyser för flera bolag och har samtidigt ett tydligt ansvar för rapportering och bokslut i ett specifikt bolag. Som Financial Controller fungerar du som ett viktigt bollplank till Head of Financial Control and Accounting och bidrar aktivt till teamets utveckling. Du agerar rådgivare i finansiella frågor, deltar i revision och hanterar löpande ad hoc-uppgifter. Detta är en roll där du får möjlighet att påverka arbetssätt och bidra till att stärka vår finansiella styrning.
  
  

**Arbetsuppgifter:**  

Samarbeta med olika delar av organisationen för att säkerställa relevant och kvalitetssäkrad finansiell rapportering samt identifiera förbättringsområden
  
  

Ansvara för månads-, kvartals- och årsbokslut för ett bolag
  
  

Säkerställa rapportering i enlighet med IFRS och andra gällande regelverk
  
  

Genomföra finansiella analyser, avvikelseanalyser och lönsamhetsuppföljning
  
  

Vara ett stöd till ledning och verksamhetschefer i ekonomiska och finansiella frågeställningar
  
  

Utveckla och effektivisera processer, rutiner och interna kontroller
  
  

Delta i arbetet med årsredovisning samt vara kontaktperson gentemot revisorer
  
  

Säkerställa efterlevnad av interna policys och externa krav
  
  

Bidra till utveckling och förbättring av rapporterings- och BI-verktyg
  
  

Självständigt driva och koordinera aktiviteter inom utvecklings- och förändringsinitiativ
  
  

Vad erbjuder vi dig? På Iver får du möjlighet att arbeta med den senaste tekniken och vara med på en spännande tillväxtresa. Vi är inkluderande och strävar efter ett genuint samarbete mot gemensamma mål. Inom Iver finns stora möjligheter till utveckling och vi finns här för att inspirera dig till att nå dina yrkesmässiga mål. Vi står bakom dig när du vill lära dig mer inom ditt specialområde, ledarskap eller nya områden. Hos Iver är du också en del av ett ambitiöst och innovativt företag, vilket innebär att förbättra, testa, utvärdera och våga ändra hur vi gör saker är viktiga ingredienser för att vi ska utvecklas.
  
Vi på Iver ger samma löfte till våra kollegor som till våra kunder. Löftet är att alltid vara ”beside you”, ”behind you” och ”before you”. Vi kallar det för "The Iver way".
  
**Förmåner hos oss:** Kollektivavtal & trygga villkor Hybridarbete Friskvårdsbidrag Terminalglasögon ⏳ Tidsbank – 24 h extra ledighet/år Privat sjukvårdsförsäkring Tjänstepension (ITP) & flexpension
  
Vem söker vi? Vi söker dig som är trygg i din roll som Financial Controller och trivs i en miljö där utveckling och förändring är en naturlig del av vardagen. Du arbetar självständigt, tar initiativ och har ett starkt driv att förbättra arbetssätt och processer. Du är analytisk och affärsorienterad, med förmåga att omvandla data till insikter och tydliga rekommendationer. Samtidigt är du kommunikativ och van att presentera finansiell information på ett pedagogiskt och förtroendeingivande sätt för olika intressenter i organisationen. Vi värdesätter att du samarbetar väl över teamgränser, är nyfiken på att lära nytt och vill bidra till både din egen och Ivers fortsatta utveckling.
  
  

**Vi ser även att du:**  

Har minst 3 års erfarenhet som Financial Controller
  
  

Har civilekonomexamen eller motsvarande
  
  

Har mycket goda kunskaper i Excel
  
  

Har erfarenhet av Power BI eller liknande BI-verktyg
  
  

Är van att arbeta med och analysera stora datamängder
  
  

Kommunicerar obehindrat på svenska och engelska, i tal och skrift
  
**Placeringsort:** Iver finns på 25 orter i Norden. Denna roll utgår från vårt huvudkontor i Solna.
  
**Övrig information:** Vi har kunder inom alla branscher och sektorer inklusive säkerhetsklassad verksamhet, därför genomför vi bakgrundskontroller i samtliga av våra rekryteringsprocesser.
  
Sök till oss! Urval sker löpande, tjänsten kan tillsättas före sista ansökningsdag. Önskad start är snarast eller enligt överenskommelse. Iver eftersträvar en jämn könsfördelning och värdesätter etnisk och kulturell mångfald.
  
**Sista ansökningsdag:** 2026-03-16
  
Välkommen att kontakta TA Partner Linnea Blomgren linnea.blomgren@iver.se vid frågor eller funderingar kring tjänsten. Vi ser fram emot din ansökan!

title: TOC Engineer
description:
Sinch is pioneering the way the world communicates. More than 150,000 businesses — including Google, Uber, Paypal, Visa, Tinder, and many others — rely on Sinch’s Customer Communications Cloud to power engaging customer experiences through mobile messaging, voice, and email.
  
Whether you need to verify users or craft omnichannel campaigns, Sinch makes it easy. Our AI-infused Super Network, APIs, and applications ensure you can connect with your customers reliably and securely, at every step of their journey.
  
At Sinch we “Dream Big”, “Win Together”, “Keep it simple”, and “Make it Happen”. These values are our foundation!
  
DESCRIPTION
  
We are looking for a TOC Engineer to join our Technical Operations Center team in Kalmar. In this role, you will focus on incident management, ensuring smooth operations with internal systems, and providing critical support in resolving technical issues.
  
Conduct in-depth troubleshooting at both the software and network layers to identify and resolve technical problems.
  
Acting as Incident Manager for our core services, ensuring timely resolutions and minimizing system downtime.
  
Monitor internal alerts for our platforms, networks, and overall traffic quality to ensure quality and stability is maintained.
  
Document and track alerts and incidents for future improvements.
  
Using insights from resolved incidents to drive ongoing system improvements and optimization.
  
Collaborate with internal teams to ensure smooth resolution of issues.
  
Provide technical support for suppliers and operators.
  
Block fraud, phishing, and AIT traffic.
  
  

In this role you will play a critical part in coordinating teams and overseeing the stability of Sinch core services. This plays an essential role in helping the company protect revenue and margins by minimizing operational disruptions.
  
This position provides exposure to a wide range of situations across different teams within the company, offering significant learning and growth opportunities, and positioning you as a valuable candidate for future roles across the organization.
  
Based in Kalmar, Sweden this role offers the opportunity to work in a diverse office environment alongside multiple technical teams. You will have this as your base when collaborating with colleagues across multiple regions around the globe.
  
REQUIREMENTS
  
  

**Must-have:**  

Bachelor's degree in computer science, Information Systems, or experience in related fields.
  
Curious mindset with a strong passion for learning and continuous improvement.
  
Proven ability to collaborate and communicate effectively with internal as well as external teams and stakeholders, taking ownership of issues, and demonstrating accountability.
  
Solid understanding of the TCP/IP protocol suite.
  
Willingness to work in 24/7 shift rotation.
  
  

**Preferred:**  

Hands-on experience with incident management and platform monitoring.
  
Background in telecom or relevant fields.
  
Understanding mobile communications standards like GSM and 4G.
  
Familiarity with UNIX and Linux systems.
  
Knowledge of the SS7 protocol suite and SIGTRAN.
  
Database knowledge.
  
  

At Sinch, we value learning, embrace change, and offer opportunities for personal and professional growth. Unfortunately, we are not supporting relocation at this time.
  
  

**Applicants must:**  

Hold Swedish or EU/EEA citizenship.
  
Have a valid Swedish work permit.
  
Be able to work from the office in Kalmar.
  
  

Our corporate language is English, please submit your application in English.
  
OUR HIRING PROCESS
  
We are committed to ensuring a recruitment process that is fair, objective, consistent, and inclusive. Our approach includes structured, competency-based interviews designed to evaluate your skills, experience, and qualifications relevant to the role. At times, we may include a data-driven assessment to enhance our hiring success and identify candidates likely to excel.
  
We believe in a two-way process and encourage you to ask questions throughout the journey. If this role isn't what you're looking for, please explore the other opportunities listed on our career page: https://www.sinch.com/careers/. No matter who you are, we hope you find an exciting path forward - hopefully with us!

title: Head of Platforms and Core Services
description:
Head of Platforms & Core Services
**Location:** Vingcard – ASSA ABLOY Global Solutions  

**Industry:** Access Solutions & Connected Technologies

At ASSA ABLOY Global Solutions, part of the global ASSA ABLOY Group, we imagine new ways people move through a safer, more open world every single day. From automatic doors and hotel locks to border control solutions — chances are, you’ve already used our technology without even realizing it. With operations in over 70 countries and more than 52,000 colleagues worldwide, we lead the way in secure, seamless access experiences.

Within our Vingcard business, we now have an exceptional opportunity for an experienced technology leader to join us as **Head of Platforms & Core Services**.

Your Impact

As Head of Platforms & Core Services, you will play a pivotal role in building, shaping, and governing the shared technology platforms that power all product units across our portfolio. Reporting directly to the CTO, you define the platform vision that enables scale, accelerates product innovation, ensures interoperability, and supports the integration of acquired businesses.

You will architect the foundations—platforms, data, integration frameworks, security principles—that allow our teams to move faster, integrate effectively, and deliver a coherent ecosystem to customers around the world.

This is a deeply technical, architecture‑led leadership role at the center of a global enterprise that continues to grow through innovation and acquisition.

Key Responsibilities
Platform & Architecture Leadership
* Define and evolve the enterprise platform strategy across cloud, data, integration, and shared services.
* Own reference architectures, architectural standards, and governing technical principles across product domains.
* Act as senior solution architect for complex cross‑brand or cross‑product initiatives.
* Ensure platform decisions balance scalability, security, resilience, and long‑term maintainability.

Business Integration & M&A Technology Roadmaps
* Own the technology integration strategy for acquired companies.
* Build and maintain rolling technology roadmaps covering:
	+ Platform migration of acquired products and teams
	+ Decommissioning of legacy systems
* Contribute to technical due diligence for future acquisitions.
* Establish repeatable integration patterns to accelerate M&A activity.

Integration & Interoperability
* Own API, middleware, and event‑driven integration standards.
* Enable seamless interoperability across product units and with hotel ecosystems (PMS, BMS, GRMS, and third‑party systems).
* Govern integration frameworks to ensure a coherent, unified solution landscape.

Data, Analytics & Intelligence Enablement
* Own shared data platforms, pipelines, and foundational analytics infrastructure.
* Enable AI, predictive analytics, and data‑driven innovation through robust governance.
* Ensure data quality, consistency, and appropriate access controls across domains.

Security, Compliance & Technical Governance
* Own security architecture, identity frameworks, and access management principles.
* Define and drive secure‑by‑design and privacy‑by‑design standards.
* Lead technical compliance programs (ISO, SOC, GDPR) with security and legal partners.
* Contribute to architecture and governance forums across the enterprise.

Skills & Experience

You bring:
* Senior leadership experience in platform architecture, distributed systems, and integration‑heavy environments.
* A proven track record steering large‑scale system integration and platform consolidation programs.
* Deep expertise in cloud‑native architectures, data platforms, and API‑led ecosystems.
* Experience integrating acquired businesses into shared enterprise platforms.
* Strong understanding of security architecture, governance, and compliance frameworks in complex B2B settings.
* Natural authority and credibility with senior engineers, architects, and technical leaders.
* Ability to influence effectively across a matrix organization without direct line management.

Leadership Attributes
* Systems thinker with long‑term architectural vision
* Pragmatic, outcome‑oriented decision‑maker
* Technically credible, calm, and authoritative
* Able to balance product team autonomy with enterprise coherence
* Strong communicator in complex cross‑functional environments

What You Can Expect From Us
* A competitive and comprehensive total rewards package
* Career development resources designed to help you grow and advance
* Supportive, accessible leadership and a values‑driven culture
* The impact and reach of an innovative, global industry leader
* The opportunity to shape the future of secure digital access worldwide

Application

Interested candidates can apply by clicking **Apply Now**.  

Please note: we can only consider applications submitted through the online application system.

About ASSA ABLOY

ASSA ABLOY has been listed four times among Forbes’ *World’s Most Innovative Companies*. We create safe, convenient, and intelligent access solutions that bring real value to our customers. Our technologies support billions of people in experiencing a more open world every day. With leading market positions across Europe, the Americas, Asia, and Oceania, our solutions span the entire spectrum of entrance and access requirements — from locks and doors to advanced automation and digital access ecosystems.  


**We are the ASSA ABLOY Group**  

Our people have made us the global leader in access solutions. In return, we open doors for them wherever they go. With nearly 63,000 colleagues in more than 70 different countries, we help billions of people experience a more open world. Our innovations make all sorts of spaces – physical and virtual – safer, more secure, and easier to access.
As an employer, we value results – not titles, or backgrounds. We empower our people to build their career around their aspirations and our ambitions – supporting them with regular feedback, training, and development opportunities. Our colleagues think broadly about where they can make the most impact, and we encourage them to grow their role locally, regionally, or even internationally.
As we welcome new people on board, it’s important to us to have diverse, inclusive teams, and we value different perspectives and experiences.
company_description: Let’s create a safer and more open world – together!

title: Network Specialist Consultant
description:
**Nätverkskonsult i Östergötland/Småland**  

  

Nu söker vi en nätverkskonsult som vill bli en del av oss på Telia Cygate!


Jag heter Ragnar Byléhn och är ansvarig för vårt affärsområde Networking i Region Mellan. Vi är ett stöttande och framtidsinriktat team som fokuserar på att hjälpa våra kunder att bygga och vidareutveckla robusta och säkra nätverkslösningar.


**Vad du kommer att göra i rollen:**

Som nätverkskonsult får du arbeta högt som lågt med planering och design av olika nätverks- och säkerhetslösningar till installation, konfiguration och felsökning i våra kunders IT-miljöer. Våra kund- och leveransprojekt spänner ofta över flera tjänsteområden. Det innebär att du kommer få arbeta nära andra specialister inom våra tre fokusområden, nätverk, säkerhet och hybrid IT. Här kan du få djupare insikt och ny inspiration i allt från Cloud, Security och on-prem, och de senaste kombinationerna där emellan. Om du på sikt vill certifiera dig inom fler områden så stödjer vi det och vill att du ska utvecklas.


* **Planering och design** av nätverks- och säkerhetslösningar hos kund på olika nivåer
* **Installation, konfiguration och felsökning** i komplexa IT-miljöer
* **Självständigt arbete** med mycket kundkontakt

**För att lyckas i rollen:**

Som person har du en förmåga att engagera kunder såväl som dina kollegor. Du kommer särskilt till din rätt när du får ge utlopp för tankar och idéer där du använder din verksamhetsförståelse för att omsätta krav till genomförbara lösningar. Du är lösningsorienterad, arbetar proaktivt och vill lyckas tillsammans med andra. Förutom det får du tillhöra en växande organisation som uppmuntrar dig på din egen utvecklingsresa.


* **Tidigare erfarenhe** t inom nätverksteknik med minst 5 år
* **Djupare kompetens** krävs inom något av följande: WiFi, SD-WAN, Avancerad routing eller lösningar baserade på f5´s teknik.
* **Kunskap av att arbeta** med lösningar från Cisco, Fortinet och/eller HPE Networks
* **Certifieringar** ses som starkt meriterande
* **Flytande svenska och engelska** , i tal och skrift

**Varför Telia Cygate?**

På Telia Cygate är vi inte bara experter på nätverk, säkerhet och olika slags moln – vi är också ett gäng som tycker att det ska vara kul att gå till jobbet! Som en del av Telia Company har vi styrkan att skapa verklig påverkan i stor skala, bidra till samhällsnytta och hjälpa våra kunder att navigera i digitaliseringens värld. Vi gör det alltid med värme, omtanke och ett leende. Här är det idéerna och våra olika perspektiv som gör oss starka, och tillsammans ser vi till att teknikens värld blir en plats där alla trivs – och där du hör hemma.


Hos oss är din utveckling viktig. Vi uppmuntrar till kontinuerlig kompetensutveckling och ser till att just du och dina intressen är i fokus. Vi vet att det är människorna som utgör vårt företag, och därför värdesätter vi glädje, kreativitet och olika perspektiv i allt vi gör.


Välkommen att växa tillsammans med oss, där vi gör teknik mänsklig och skapar verklig påverkan!


**Vad vi erbjuder**  

När du börjar hos oss får du ett omfattande förmånspaket anpassat efter din lokala marknad, möjlighet till hybridarbete och mer. Du har också chans att få bonus baserat på din prestation och Telias resultat.


**Låter det intressant? Ansök!**

Vi ser fram mot din ansökan senast **2026-03-31** Rollen kan komma att stängas tidigare om vi hittar rätt kandidat - så vänta in för länge!


Placeringsort: Norrköping, Jönköping eller Växjö


Om du går vidare i processen kommer du att kontaktas av vår Talent Acquisition Partner. Bakgrund- och referenskontroller ingår i processen.


Vill du veta mer om rollen? Kontakta gärna mig på ragnar.bylehn@cygate.se


**Lika möjligheter för alla**

På Telia värderar vi kompetens och utvecklingspotential. Vi främjar mångfald och ser till att varje individs behov tillgodoses, oavsett funktionsvariation, kön, ålder, nationalitet, sexuell läggning eller social bakgrund. Tillsammans skapar vi en inkluderande arbetsmiljö där din unikhet är vår styrka.


**Välkommen till Telia Cygate – Home of Experts**

title: Strategic Account Executive - Data360 - SWE
description:
*To get the best candidate experience, please consider applying for a maximum of 3 roles within 12 months to ensure you are not duplicating efforts.*

Job Category


Sales
Job Details


**About Salesforce**

Salesforce is the #1 AI CRM, where humans with agents drive customer success together. Here, ambition meets action. Tech meets trust. And innovation isn’t a buzzword — it’s a way of life. The world of work as we know it is changing and we're looking for Trailblazers who are passionate about bettering business and the world through AI, driving innovation, and keeping Salesforce's core values at the heart of it all.


Ready to level-up your career at the company leading workforce transformation in the agentic era? You’re in the right place! Agentforce is the future of AI, and you are the future of Salesforce.


At **Salesforce** , we're seeking outstanding individuals to join our team as Account Executives, where your role will be pivotal in driving revenue growth and encouraging enduring client relationships. Our dedication to revolutionizing customer experiences is at the heart of everything we do. The Salesforce Data Cloud, our flagship innovation, harnesses the power of real-time data to reimagine the Customer 360, enabling businesses to build awe-inspiring customer interactions at scale.  



  

As a part of our esteemed Data Cloud Specialist selling team, you will play a pivotal role in shaping the future of customer engagement. We are looking for professionals with extensive experience in highly technical sales with emerging B2B technologies. Collaborating with potential clients, you will dive deep into understanding their needs and challenges, showcasing how Data Cloud can solve their most critical business goals.
  

  

**What you’ll be doing:**

* Employ your wealth of experience in enterprise and commercial B2B sales to identify and engage potential Data Cloud clients.
* Demonstrate your extensive knowledge of the Salesforce platform, Data Cloud, and Tableau to craft highly tailored solutions that resonate with clients.
* Source and qualify Data Cloud opportunities that fit our ideal customer profile.
* Demonstrate your adeptness at leading comprehensive discovery conversations, unearthing prospective customers’ critical business needs and resolving if and how Data Cloud can help them.
* Craft and present compelling Points of View (PoVs) that underscore the tangible business value of Data Cloud.
* Collaborate across cross-functional teams to show up as “One Salesforce” and ensure a seamless client experience throughout the entire sales process
* Highlight how our solutions align seamlessly with clients' long-term strategic objectives
Use your unique ability to combine deep discovery with your own PoV to present compelling Data Cloud use cases that resonate with technical and business buyers  
* 

  

**Preferred qualifications:**

* Experience in enterprise and commercial B2B sales within the context of highly technical sales.
* Expertise in modern cloud data platforms (e.g., Snowflake, Databricks, Big Query) and data analytics tools (e.g., Tableau), acquired through years of technology sales experience.
* An understanding of the Salesforce Advantage across Sales Cloud, Marketing Cloud, Service Cloud to relate Data Cloud requirements in the context of Customer needs.
* A heightened discernment, adept at steering impactful discovery conversations to uncover the most intricate client needs.
* A proven track record of consistently surpassing sales targets within a technical sales environment, underscoring your mastery of intricate sales processes.
* Exceptional communication and negotiation skills honed through your experience in technology sales.
Fluent business English + Right to work in Sweden  
* 

  

**Skills/Technologies:**

Salesforce platform (Sales, Service, Marketing Clouds), technical sales, negotiation techniques, Cloud Data Warehouse technologies, Business Intelligence (Tableau). Salesforce Data Cloud.  



  

**Characteristics** :


* A results-driven attitude: Proven ability to exceed sales goals within the context of highly technical sales.
* Demonstrate ability to prioritize working in a cross-functional environment
* Business-focused outlook: Skillfully translates technical solutions into palpable business value
* A talent for relationship-building: Establishes enduring client connections, rooted in your advanced sales expertise.
* A curiosity about problem-solving: Devises innovative solutions to address complex client challenges, using your extensive technology sales experience.
* Scrappy: Agile, roll-up-your-sleeves attitude: Progress over perfection.

Unleash Your Potential


When you join Salesforce, you’ll be limitless in all areas of your life. Our benefits and resources support you to find balance and *be your best* , and our AI agents accelerate your impact so you can *do your best* . Together, we’ll bring the power of Agentforce to organizations of all sizes and deliver amazing experiences that customers love. Apply today to not only shape the future — but to redefine what’s possible — for yourself, for AI, and the world.


Accommodations


If you require assistance due to a disability applying for open positions please submit a request via this Accommodations Request Form .


Posting Statement


Salesforce is an equal opportunity employer and maintains a policy of non-discrimination with all employees and applicants for employment. What does that mean exactly? It means that at Salesforce, we believe in equality for all. And we believe we can lead the path to equality in part by creating a workplace that’s inclusive, and free from discrimination. Know your rights: workplace discrimination is illegal. Any employee or potential employee will be assessed on the basis of merit, competence and qualifications – without regard to race, religion, color, national origin, sex, sexual orientation, gender expression or identity, transgender status, age, disability, veteran or marital status, political viewpoint, or other classifications protected by law. This policy applies to current and prospective employees, no matter where they are in their Salesforce employment journey. It also applies to recruiting, hiring, job assignment, compensation, promotion, benefits, training, assessment of job performance, discipline, termination, and everything in between. Recruiting, hiring, and promotion decisions at Salesforce are fair and based on merit. The same goes for compensation, benefits, promotions, transfers, reduction in workforce, recall, training, and education.

title: SAP Cloud ERP Finance Architect
description:
**We help the world run better**  

At SAP, we keep it simple: you bring your best to us, and we'll bring out the best in you. We're builders touching over 20 industries and 80% of global commerce, and we need your unique talents to help shape what's next. The work is challenging – but it matters. You'll find a place where you can be yourself, prioritize your wellbeing, and truly belong. What's in it for you? Constant learning, skill growth, great benefits, and a team that wants you to grow and succeed. **YOUR TEAM**


We are experienced team of architects located across several Nordic countries. Our team works both with on customer assignments and with our sales colleagues to position viable approaches that support our customers’ situations. We help customers get approaches implemented and realize value. We conceptualize solutions, but we also enjoy getting our hands into the system. Together as a team, we make miracles. We are looking for and open-minded and flexible colleague who will complement our team of highly esteemed experts to make SAP Cloud ERP successful. Apply now, and let’s start discussion on how you can build your own track in SAP.

 **ROLE DESCRIPTION**


We are looking for a finance architect for SAP Cloud ERP. Your focus is on understanding end-to-end finance processes and principles, with deep finance domain expertise. You have solid experience with SAP ERP implementations, preferably in the public cloud, and a strong functional background. You listen carefully to uncover customer pain points and requirements, and you drive those requirements into design and delivery. You support and guide stakeholders to make sound decisions, steering them toward fit-to-standard solutions, SAP best practices, and relevant scope items. You lead finance process discussions and translate requirements into clear solution options and adoption roadmaps. You enjoy leading and guiding with a gentle, professional manner, collaborating internally and externally across the ecosystem to accelerate adoption.


You can be located in any of the Nordic Countries. Relocation is not supported.

 **As an SAP Cloud ERP and public cloud-focused finance architect, you will**

* Master the public cloud project lifecycle.
* Leverage a minimum of five years’ finance domain expertise and either at least two end-to-end SAP Cloud ERP public cloud implementations or two years of hands-on public cloud delivery experience, to guide customers confidently.
* Use a public-cloud architect approach to help customers design and adopt best practice, end-to-end solution concepts.
* Guide customers to maintain clean-core principles in SAP Cloud ERP, prioritizing fit-to-standard, standard scope items, and SAP Best Practices content, and using approved extensibility instead of core modifications.
* Support customers in automating their finance processes, leveraging intelligent capabilities and embedded AI within SAP Cloud ERP.
* Actively participate in delivery to demonstrate how modern SAP solutions can be adopted.
* Collaborate effectively with SAP partners.
* Manage internal teams and collaborate with partners during the solution approach definition process.
* Build trusted-advisor relationships with customer stakeholders.
* Partner with Sales and Account teams to present the benefits and value proposition of SAP finance solutions and architecture.
* Work with Sales on demand creation by attending customer or prospect meetings to present SAP services capabilities and delivery approach.
* Prepare system demos and discuss processes and functional features.

 **YOUR PROFILE**

* You are used to leading customer discussions and have an approach that moves customers forward.
* You can take a helicopter view to see the overall architecture.
* You are eager to deep-dive when a concept requires a closer look.
* You use systems to prove that concepts are working.
* You can communicate easily with developers and management.
* Business communication in both English and the regional language is needed.

 **Bring out your best**  

SAP innovations help more than four hundred thousand customers worldwide work together more efficiently and use business insight more effectively. Originally known for leadership in enterprise resource planning (ERP) software, SAP has evolved to become a market leader in end-to-end business application software and related services for database, analytics, intelligent technologies, and experience management. As a cloud company with two hundred million users and more than one hundred thousand employees worldwide, we are purpose-driven and future-focused, with a highly collaborative team ethic and commitment to personal development. Whether connecting global industries, people, or platforms, we help ensure every challenge gets the solution it deserves. At SAP, you can bring out your best.
  

  

**We win with inclusion**  

SAP’s culture of inclusion, focus on health and well-being, and flexible working models help ensure that everyone – regardless of background – feels included and can run at their best. At SAP, we believe we are made stronger by the unique capabilities and qualities that each person brings to our company, and we invest in our employees to inspire confidence and help everyone realize their full potential. We ultimately believe in unleashing all talent and creating a better world.  

  

SAP is committed to the values of Equal Employment Opportunity and provides accessibility accommodations to applicants with physical and/or mental disabilities. If you are interested in applying for employment with SAP and are in need of accommodation or special assistance to navigate our website or to complete your application, please send an e-mail with your request to Recruiting Operations Team: Careers@sap.com.  

  

For SAP employees: Only permanent roles are eligible for the SAP Employee Referral Program, according to the eligibility rules set in the SAP Referral Policy. Specific conditions may apply for roles in Vocational Training.  

  

Qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to their age, race, religion, national origin, ethnicity, gender (including pregnancy, childbirth, et al), sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, protected veteran status, or disability, in compliance with applicable federal, state, and local legal requirements.  

  

Successful candidates might be required to undergo a background verification with an external vendor. **AI Usage in the Recruitment Process**
For information on the responsible use of AI in our recruitment process, please refer to our Guidelines for Ethical Usage of AI in the Recruiting Process.
Please note that any violation of these guidelines may result in disqualification from the hiring process.
