We celebrate diversity in our workplace, and all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to age, ancestry, color, family or medical care leave, gender identity or expression, genetic information, marital status, medical condition, national origin, physical or mental disability, political affiliation, protected veteran status, race, religion, sex (including pregnancy), sexual orientation, or other legally protected characteristics.
   

  

 All your information will be kept confidential according to EEO guidelines.
   

  

 Is role eligible for Immigration Sponsorship? No. Please note that we will not sponsor applicants for work visas for this position.

title: Senior Sales Development Representative
description:
⭐
 **Ready for your next challenge? Let’s talk.**
 At Bannerflow, we’re always interested in connecting with curious, driven people who want to grow with us. While our needs evolve over time, one thing stays constant: we value great talent and strong team players who want to make an impact.
   

  

**What We Offer**
 A strong team spirit built on trust & ownership
   

  

 We believe in giving people responsibility and the freedom to succeed. We trust each other, collaborate closely, and assume the best intentions. Together, we decide how to win.
   

  

**Continuous growth and new challenges**
 Our entrepreneurial mindset encourages initiative, experimentation, and learning. If you have ideas on how we can improve, scale, or work smarter — we want to hear them.
   

  

**A passionate and fun culture**
 We take our work seriously, but not ourselves. Expect a diverse and inclusive environment with activities like Health Month, inspirational talks, team events, company trips, board game nights, and more.
   

  

**A stable, global Ad Tech company with strong growth ambitions**
 Based in Stockholm and working with customers worldwide, Bannerflow continues to expand into new markets. With the support of our new owners, we’re well-positioned for continued growth in 2025 and beyond.
   

  

 🦋
 **You + Bannerflow?**
 From time to time, we look for talented Sales Development Representatives (SDRs) who want to grow within B2B SaaS and Ad Tech. In an SDR role at Bannerflow, you’d play a key part in building relationships with future customers, generating qualified leads, and supporting our commercial growth by working closely with Account Executives and the wider go-to-market team.
   

  

**What You Might Work On**
* Generating and nurturing qualified leads using modern tools and data-driven methods
* Engaging prospects and helping them understand the value of Bannerflow
* Managing and improving pipeline data in our CRM
* Staying curious about market trends and sharing insights with the team


**What We Typically Look For**
* 1.5+ years of experience in sales development or a similar commercial role
* A strong sense of ownership and motivation to grow
* Comfort using prospecting tools like LinkedIn Sales Navigator, Salesloft, or Cognism
* Strong communication skills in English (additional languages are always a plus)
* A commercial mindset and interest in SaaS, Ad Tech, and B2B sales


**Why Bannerflow?**
 We’re a values-driven company built on passion, collaboration, and challenge. Here, you’ll have the chance to grow alongside experienced colleagues, influence how we work, and be part of a team shaping the future of creative automation in Ad Tech.
   

  

 We offer a hybrid work setup, competitive compensation, ITP1 pension, health allowance, parental leave top-up, and health insurance, plus a culture filled with padel tournaments, hackathons, webinars, and Friday beers 🍻

 At Palo Alto Networks®, we’re united by a shared mission—to protect our digital way of life. We thrive at the intersection of innovation and impact, solving real-world problems with cutting-edge technology and bold thinking. Here, everyone has a voice, and every idea counts. If you’re ready to do the most meaningful work of your career alongside people who are just as passionate as you are, you’re in the right place.
   

  

**Who We Are**
 In order to be the cybersecurity partner of choice, we must trailblaze the path and shape the future of our industry. This is something our employees work at each day and is defined by our values: Disruption, Collaboration, Execution, Integrity, and Inclusion. We weave AI into the fabric of everything we do and use it to augment the impact every individual can have. title: Senior Data Scientist – Financial Modelling
description:
At Qred, we’re on a mission to power entrepreneurs and small businesses with fast, fair, and data-driven financial solutions. We’re one of Sweden’s fastest-growing fintech banks - profitable, licensed, and expanding across Europe. Our culture is entrepreneurial, collaborative, and built on trust and ownership. Technology is the heart of our business, driving everything from credit assessments to customer experience.
   

  

 We’re now looking for a Senior Data Scientist who’s ready to take ownership of the next generation of our financial risk models - shaping the foundation of how we assess, forecast, and manage risk in a high-growth environment.
   

  

**What You’ll Do**
 You’ll be our subject-matter expert in quantitative risk modelling, leading the design, development, and deployment of IFRS 9 / Expected Credit Loss (ECL) and other key financial models. You’ll collaborate with risk, finance, and engineering to turn advanced analytics into production-grade systems that directly impact Qred’s financial health and strategic decisions.
   

  

**Your responsibilities will include:**
* IFRS 9 / ECL Model Ownership
+ Lead the end-to-end lifecycle of IFRS 9 models (PD, LGD, EAD) - from design to deployment.
+ Integrate macroeconomic forecasting and forward-looking scenarios into our ECL framework.

* Advanced Financial Modelling
+ Develop fair value models.
+ Build expected repayment and prepayment models to forecast cash flows and customer behavior.

* Model Validation & Governance
+ Document, monitor, and defend model design and performance for internal validation and external audits.
+ Establish a robust model monitoring and recalibration process.

* Data Strategy & Analysis
+ Partner with data engineering to integrate new data sources (e.g. new product, transactional or alternative).
+ Conduct deep-dive analyses to uncover key drivers of credit loss and performance - delivering insights to the CCO and CFO.

* Collaboration & Mentorship
+ Work closely with Finance and Credit as the primary quantitative expert.
+ Mentor and guide junior data scientists and analysts to raise the technical bar.


**What We’re Looking For**
**Experience & Expertise**
* 5+ years of experience in quantitative data science or risk modelling within financial services, fintech, or a high-growth tech setting.
* Deep hands-on knowledge of IFRS 9 and ECL model development (PD, LGD, EAD).
* Practical experience with fair value and behaviour models.


**Technical Skills**
* Expert in Python (pandas, NumPy, scikit-learn, Statsmodels) and SQL.
* Proficient with ML techniques (e.g., Logistic Regression, Random Forests, Survival Analysis).
* Familiar with relevant tools and cloud environments (Git, AWS stack).


**Education**
* Degree in a quantitative field (Statistics, Economics, Finance, Computer Science, Physics, or related).


**Soft Skills**
* Strong communicator, able to explain complex models and financial impact to non-technical teams.
* Pragmatic, structured, and outcome-focused, you can navigate ambiguity and deliver value.
* Ownership mindset, you take initiative and follow through.


**Nice to have**
* Experience with survival analysis for behavioural or prepayment modelling.
* Exposure to short-term consumer or SME lending environments (e.g., BNPL, revolving credit, credit card).
* Familiarity with other relevant regulatory frameworks.


**Who You Are**
 You’re a curious, hands-on problem solver who thrives in a fast-paced, entrepreneurial environment. You balance analytical depth with real-world pragmatism and love turning complex ideas into working systems. You care about impact - and you want your models to power better decisions for real small businesses.
   

  

**One last thing**
 This is a full-time, permanent position based in Stockholm (Drottninggatan 98). While we encourage a hybrid setup, we do expect you to be at least three days per week at the office. Don’t wait to send in your application, we are reviewing applications on a rolling basis. While the start date is flexible, the right candidate can join us immediately.
   

  

*Qred celebrates diversity and does not discriminate based on ethnicity, religion, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, disability status, or any other applicable characteristics protected by law.*
 Qred is an international FinTech scale-up that specializes in digital financing solutions for small businesses, with operations in the Nordics, Benelux, Germany and Brazil. We are passionate about helping small businesses thrive and grow, by providing them with business loans and credit cards. Right now we’re in an exciting phase of our journey that focuses on growth through smart product development and technology fueled by international expansion.

title: Startup Account Manager - Nordics GFD, Europe North
description:
**This job is with Amazon, an inclusive employer and a member of myGwork – the largest global platform for the LGBTQ+ business community. Please do not contact the recruiter directly.**
**Description**
 From Bolt to Too Good To Go, the world's top startups, many of them now Enterprises, build on AWS. We offer the world's most comprehensive and broadly adopted cloud platform, offering over 200 fully featured services from data centers globally. Millions of customers - including the fastest-growing startups, largest enterprises, and leading government agencies - are using AWS to lower costs, become more agile, and innovate faster.
   

  

 The AWS Startup sales team in Stockholm is looking for a new team member who is passionate about enabling and developing technology startups. You will be at the heart of latest technology trends like Generative and Agentic AI, machine learning (ML), serverless or Internet-of-Things (IoT) to help your startups grow.
   

  

 Your startup customers leverage AWS to innovate and become the next unicorns and future enterprises.
   

  

 As an AWS Startup Account Manager, you will turn your deep expertise of the Nordics and Baltics markets to your advantage to win the most promising startups and scaleups for AWS. Working backwards from your customer's priorities, you get to mobilize the full breadth of AWS capabilities to make an impact for your customers. Your tools of the trade will be the AWS services portfolio, best-in-class startup programs, and AWS's co-selling mechanisms.
   

  

 This is a hunter role. You are expected to set your sights on the most important startups and scaleups not yet building on AWS, earn trust with them, deeply understand their businesses and challenges, design comprehensive strategies impacting all aspects of their business, and successfully migrate their cloud workloads to AWS. You should be able to communicate and act at all levels, from C-Suite to individual engineers. Your job will be to shape new realities for all stakeholders, empowering them to innovate and accelerate time-to-market. You will orchestrate deal teams to deliver results across internal and external stakeholders, such as the Solutions Architecture, Business Development, Partner, Training, and Support teams.
   

  

 You are passionate about technology startups, have excellent data skills, and intuition on finding the best Startups to support from Europe North, You have grit, are a self-starter with an entrepreneurial spirit who is prepared to work in a demanding environment, execute against ambitious goals and consistently embrace the Amazon Culture.
   

  

 AWS Global Sales drives adoption of the AWS cloud worldwide, enabling customers of all sizes to innovate and expand in the cloud. Our team empowers every customer to grow by providing tailored service, unmatched technology, and consistent support. We dive deep to understand each customer's unique challenges, then craft innovative solutions that accelerate their success. This customer-first approach is how we built the world's most adopted cloud. Join us and help us grow.
   

  

 Key job responsibilities
   

  

* Identify, engage and migrate Nordics and Baltics startups to AWS
* Create and execute against comprehensive territory and account-level strategy to exceed your goals
* Facilitate long-term relationships from C-level to engineers, and industry experts, investor circles etc.
* Lead a team of cross-functional stakeholders both internally at AWS and externally with Partners
* Articulate compelling value propositions around AWS services and Amazon
* Represent AWS at conferences & marketing events
* Expect moderate travel


**About The Team**
 Europe North startup team covers the 11 country area (Nordics, Baltics, Benelux) operating out of 2 hubs (Stockholm and Amsterdam) and 2 satellite offices (Helsinki and Copenhagen). The team is a diverse mix of experienced technology sellers, former founders, and startup ecosystem stakeholders (i.e. venture capital). The team consists of Account Managers, Solution Architects, Investor Managers, Partner Managers, Demand Generation Representatives, and Business Developers. We operate as one team to support the scale and go to market of startups in our region - from early stage (pre-seed) to scale up.
   

  

**Basic Qualifications**
* Min 6 years of relevant technology sales, business development or consulting experience
* Several years of relevant technology sales, business development or consulting experience


**Preferred Qualifications**
* Relevant advanced degree (e.g. MBA, MA, MS)
* Experience in driving adoption of new technologies and solutions
* Worked at/with tech startups in the past
* Previous Cloud expertise at a technology company
* Prior experience of working abroad/internationally


 Amazon is an equal opportunities employer. We believe passionately that employing a diverse workforce is central to our success. We make recruiting decisions based on your experience and skills. We value your passion to discover, invent, simplify and build. Protecting your privacy and the security of your data is a longstanding top priority for Amazon. Please consult our Privacy Notice (https://www.amazon.jobs/en/privacy\_page) to know more about how we collect, use and transfer the personal data of our candidates.
   

  

 Our inclusive culture empowers Amazonians to deliver the best results for our customers. If you have a disability and need a workplace accommodation or adjustment during the application and hiring process, including support for the interview or onboarding process, please visit https://amazon.jobs/content/en/how-we-hire/accommodations for more information. If the country/region you're applying in isn't listed, please contact your Recruiting Partner.]]>

title: Fullstack Developer for Product & Platform Engineering
description:
***Are you passionate about building and growing impactful products in a collaborative and innovative environment? Join our growing team as a full-stack developer in Stockholm, where you'll work on a strategic core product, using technologies like C#/.NET Core and cloud solutions in Azure and/or AWS and be a part of a talented team that values growth and innovation!***
**This is what makes the position as Full Stack Developer unique**
* Play a key role in shaping a strategic product that drives the company's success.
* Take ownership of an evolving product with opportunities for continuous development and innovation.
* Collaborate with a talented and supportive team that values growth and teamwork.


 The hiring manager for this role is
 **Jelena Falatov, Manager, Portals, Product & Pricing** 
 . As a leader, she is committed to creating an environment where people can do their best work, supporting both personal and professional growth, leading with empathy, and fostering a culture that is open, supportive, and inspiring, while still providing the right challenges to help every team member thrive.
   

  

**Your role & influence as Full Stack Developer**
***Responsibility* 
 :** 
 In this role, you’ll play a key part in full-stack development within a collaborative, cross-functional team, helping shape and grow a strategic product that directly impacts our business.
   

  

 You’ll work across the stack from back-end services and APIs to front-end interfaces with a strong focus on back-end systems design, integration, and messaging architecture in high-volume, transaction-heavy environments. This is an opportunity to deepen your expertise while building products at scale in a supportive, innovative team culture.
   

  

***Collaboration* 
 :** 
 Together with your small but growing team, you take care of building, maintaining, and developing a core product, collaborating closely not only with your immediate team members but also with the Product & Platform Engineering department.
   

  

 We’re looking for someone who is not just technically strong but also proactive, curious, and energized by collaboration. In a focused and ambitious team undergoing transformation, you’ll contribute your perspective, explore unknowns, and help shape both the product and the way we work. You thrive in turning ambiguity into clarity and feel confident contributing ideas or suggesting new approaches. If you’re motivated by opportunities to influence both technology and ways of working, Dustin is a place where your initiative and insight will make a meaningful impact.
   

  

**Core Activities**
* Build impactful products – take ownership in developing and maintaining the core platform that powers our success.
* Drive innovation – continuously enhance and evolve the product, shaping its future with fresh ideas, improvements, and focus on automation with AI tooling.
* Thrive together – collaborate in a supportive, team-driven environment where every win is shared.


**Benefits Of Joining Dustin**
 We believe there's more to Dustin than just the benefits listed here. You'll fully understand this once you're with us. Curious? Our Life at Dustin - Dustin Sweden page has you covered.
   

  

**You can find more on our benefits below in the vacancy.**
**This Is What We Imagine You Bring**
 We’re looking for a curious, open-minded problem-solver with a strong team spirit and a passion for continuous learning. You bring around 3-5 years of hands-on experience with C#, .NET, Kubernetes and REST APIs, building and improving products. You’re confident designing distributed systems and working with SQL databases and cloud platforms: Azure or AWS.
   

  

*Additionally, it'll be nice to see that you have experience with:*
* Continuous Delivery mindset & CI/CD pipelines
* Azure ServiceBus & Functions
* Infrastructure as Code (Bicep/Terraform)
* Frontend (JavaScript/Node.js, React, Blazor)


**What can you expect next?**
 To Ensure a Fair Recruitment Process Free From Unconscious Bias, We Handle Your Application Anonymously And Do Not Accept Cover Letters. Please Refrain From Sending One, So That The Selection Is Based Solely On Professional Competencies. We Expect The Following Steps In The Recruitment Process
   

  

* Telephone screening with Talent Acquisition Partner, Filippa
* First interview with Hiring Manager, Jelena, and possibly, another future colleague.
* Technical Assessment (Code Assignment) and a Second interview with two future colleagues.
* Professional references


***Please note that for this specific job, we don´t provide any relocation or work permit sponsorship support.***

title: Fullstack Engineer - Frontend Focus
description:
**Join our highly skilled team of developers - breaking new ground and shaping the future of retail.** 




  





**We dare to dream big, we have the courage to keep raising the bar, and we’re committed to being a force for good in retail - helping both established and fast-growing brands meet the ever-changing expectations of their customers.** 




  





**Sitoo is a fast-growing technology company exploring how far we can take innovation to deliver the world’s best Unified Commerce Platform and Point of Sale. Our technology is used in more than 20 countries - a number that keeps growing thanks to our incredible team of engineers. And we have no intention of slowing down. Are you the Software Engineer we’re looking for?** 




  





**Your Mission at Sitoo** 




  





 As a Fullstack Engineer at Sitoo, you'll play a vital role in building our next-generation web products. You'll join a small, agile team focused on developing the world's best Point of Sales and Unified Commerce Platform. Your work will span front and backend applications built with React, TypeScript, and Node.js. In our small team environment, your impact and influence will be significant.
 



  





**What you'll do** 




  




* Own, develop and operate Sitoo’s web products
* Collaborate with the team to innovate and improve processes and tooling
* Build a scalable infrastructure in AWS
* Write tests to ensure product quality
* Manage CI/CD pipelines on GitHub
* Participate in development guilds



  





**What you'll bring to the table** 




  




* 5+ years of experience as a professional fullstack developer building and maintaining web applications
* Experience writing Node.js services and frontend apps with TypeScript
* A background working in fast-growing or scaling environments
* Experience in cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP)
* Fluency in English, both written and spoken



  





**Bonus** 




  




* Azure DevOps, Github Actions or GitLab CI/CD
* IaC with CDK or similar
* E2E tests with Playwright
* AI-assisted integrated development environment or agentic coding tools like Claude Code, GitHub Copilot or Cursor
* Working with design systems / documentation in Storybook



  





**Why Sitoo** 




  





 We are forward thinkers. By turning curiosity into knowledge — and knowledge into continuous improvement — we break new ground and shape the future of retail.
 



  





 We believe in an inclusive culture where everyone feels like they belong. We support each other, win together, celebrate success together, and overcome challenges together.
 



  





 Today, we are close to 100 dedicated experts with a positive and solution-oriented mindset. Most importantly, we take care of each other, and we never forget to have fun.

title: Event Marketeer
description:
****Om rollen****
 Brinner du för marknadsföring och att skapa content som fångar uppmärksamhet, bygger relationer och driver verkliga resultat? Har du redan testat dina vingar inom digital marknadsföring, kommunikation och sociala medier och står nu i ett vägskäl redo att ta nästa steg i en roll där din kommunikation når tusentals människor?
   

  

 Vi på Easyfairs Nordic söker en Event Marketeer som vill vara med och skapa engagerande kommunikation för två av Sveriges största och mest inflytelserika event:
 **Ekonomi & Företag** 
 och
 **Personal & Chef.** 
 Här får du arbeta med marknadsföring som märks på riktigt – från första kampanj till fulla eventgolv med engagerade besökare och utställare.
   

  

 Easyfairs är en av Europas ledande eventarrangörer och driver några av Nordens viktigaste eventarenor, inklusive Kistamässan och Malmömässan.
   

  

**Din roll – skapa content som når rätt målgrupp och driver engagemang** 
  

  

 I rollen som Event Marketeer ansvarar du för att planera, skapa och optimera marknadsföring som driver räckvidd, engagemang och konvertering. Du arbetar nära projektledare, säljteam och innehållsspecialister och spelar en central roll i hur våra event kommuniceras och upplevs.
   

  

 Du kommer att:
   

  

* Skapa engagerande content för sociala medier, webb, nyhetsbrev och kampanjer
* Planera och genomföra marknadsaktiviteter som driver trafik, registreringar och deltagande
* Anpassa budskap och innehåll för olika målgrupper och kanaler
* Säkerställa att kommunikationen är relevant, träffsäker och varumärkesbyggande
* Analysera resultat, följa upp kampanjer och optimera innehåll baserat på data
* Bidra till att utveckla och stärka våra event genom strategisk och kreativ marknadsföring. Du arbetar både strategiskt och operativt – från idé och innehållsskapande till publicering, analys och optimering.


**Kvalifikationer** 
  

  

 Du har redan börjat bygga din kompetens inom marknadsföring och känner dig trygg i att skapa innehåll som engagerar och når ut. Du förstår hur man kommunicerar effektivt i digitala kanaler och hur content bidrar till affärsresultat.
   

  

**Vi söker dig som:** 
  

  

* Har en eftergymnasial utbildning inom marknadsföring, kommunikation eller liknande
* Har erfarenhet av digital marknadsföring, content creation och resultatdrivet arbete i sociala medier
* Har förmåga att skapa engagerande och målgruppsanpassat innehåll
* Är en duktig storyteller
* Kan arbeta självständigt och driva ditt arbete framåt
* Innehar grundläggande kunskaper i content- och designverktyg som Canva eller Adobe Creative Cloud. Datadriven marknadsföring och kampanjuppföljning
* Talar och skriver obehindrat på svenska och engelska


**Meriterande är erfarenhet av:** 
  

  

* WordPress och SEO
* Marknadsföring i verktyg så som Salesforce Marketing Cloud eller HubSpot
* Google Marketing Platform (GA4, Looker, Search Console)
* Eventmarknadsföring eller B2B-kommunikation

title: Lösningsarkitekt Digital arbetsplats
description:
**Bakgrund och Uppdragsbeskrivning**
 Uppdraget avser att utföras av en resurskonsult (en tjänst som utförs av en Konsult i syfte att ge förstärkning till Svenska kraftnät i det löpande arbete som utförs av Svenska kraftnät. Utförandet av dessa tjänster leds och styrs av Svenska kraftnät). Förvaltningsobjektet IT-arbetsplats genomgår just nu en transformation till nästa generations Digitala arbetsplats/Digital Workplace. Lösningsarkitekten kommer att bidra med sin erfarenhet och kunskap i resan mot framtidens Digitala arbetsplats såväl till förvaltningen. Rollen som lösningsarkitekt inom digital arbetsplats innebär att koordinera, styra och aktivt delta i Svenska kraftnäts transformation till nästa generation IT-arbetsplats.
   

  

**Arbetsuppgifter**
 Ansvarar för att ta fram och kvalitetssäkra lösningsarkitektur inom ramen för projekt eller förvaltning, i linje med övergripande arkitektur, styrande principer och riktlinjer. Utformar lösningar som integrerar verksamhetsbehov, informationshantering och teknikval. Säkerställer att lösningarna är realiserbara, hållbara över tid och stödjer verksamhetens mål. Samarbetar nära utvecklingsteam, projektledare och andra arkitektroller. Konsulten ska ta fram design och implementera lösningar för modernt samarbete innehållande Teams, AzureAD, Sharepoint, digital whiteboard, persistent chat och videokonferens. Konsulten kommer även ta fram nödvändig dokumentation samt bidra i överlämning till linjeorganisation samt stötta linjeorganisationen i förvaltning. Rollen innebär både arbete med att ta fram nödvändiga designdokument samt att vara hands on och implementera lösningar tillsammans med tekniker. Bifoga CV på svenska.

title: Senior Enterprise Account Executive
description:
The Mission: Building the Future of Datatonic Nordics
   

  

 Datatonic is at a turning point for the next two years of significant, accelerated growth. Having already established a strong foothold in the Nordic region, we are looking to build repeatable, scalable commercial structures aligned with our ambitious revenue goals.
   

  

 We are looking for a high-impact, native-speaking (ideally Swedish) player-coach to architect this future. This is a role for a heavy-weight seller who can consistently create and close large, outcome-led deals while setting the quality bar for our regional expansion. You are joining at the perfect time to shape the journey and transition into a Senior Sales Leadership role within 6 - 12 months, where you will eventually be responsible for managing the European sales team as a whole.
   

  

 What You’ll Do: Outcome-Led Growth
   

  

 You will inherit a strategic book of accounts, but your task is to ‘follow the money’ and develop them from the ground up. We don't want small sprints; we want a builder who can anchor themselves in the market to land large-scale, transformational programs of work.
   

  

* Network the Account: You will constantly network and build your book of contacts within your clients. Identifying threads, finding leads, and navigating the client ‘chess board’ to move from tactical conversations to strategic partnerships
* Deep Client Knowledge: You are comfortable being on-site at the client regularly (minimum twice a week). You know that the most valuable "nuggets" of information are found during 1-1 conversations. You listen for the things that are not being said to understand client pain better than they do.
* Outcome-Led Deal Architecture: Create, ideate and lead complex, multi-stakeholder deals (typically £250k+) by focusing on how value is created for the client’s strategy and KPIs.
* Internal Orchestration: You will communicate client needs back to Datatonic with clarity, ensuring we deploy the right technical and coaching support to drive opportunities forward at the right pace
* Challenge the Status Quo: You don't just take orders. You challenge the client’s thinking, translating unstructured business pain into clear commercial scope and narratives.


 The Non-Negotiables
   

  

 We are seeking someone with a hunter/business development mindset who can create opportunities based on what they hear. This role requires independence; comfortable operating sellers to motivate themselves to meet their clients.
   

  

* Nordic Native & Vertical Expert: You are a native speaker (ideally Swedish) with an existing network to draw on in Telco, Agency/Media, Insurance, Gaming/Entertainment, or our incubation verticals of Retail and Pharma
* Enterprise Heavy-Weight: You have a proven track record in Data, AI, or Cloud and are comfortable leading through ambiguity and early-stage problem definition
* Extreme Independence: You are professionally persistent and self-motivated. You don’t need to be micro-coached to get under the skin of a problem; you do it because it's your job.
* Executive Presence: You have the gravitas to hold a room (not just a call) with senior buyers and C-suite stakeholders.
* Team Player, Not Lone Wolf: While you are a high-performer, you know how to operate as part of a team to unlock materially larger outcomes


 What Success Looks Like (The First 180 Days)
   

  

 We measure success by seller behaviours, not just short-term revenue.
   

  

* Day 30: You have mapped your book of accounts understanding the key stakeholders to approach, identified the power base, and have secured 5+ on-site discovery sessions to help move the needle in our understanding of the client
* Day 90: You have moved at least one accounts from being ‘static’ to a defined, large-scale program of work by understanding the most value and outcome driven data and AI topics on
* Day 180: You demonstrate high learning velocity and pattern recognition, showing the coaching potential required for your leadership transition

title: Power Platform Governance-konsult
description:
Som
 **Power Platform Governance konsult** 
 på B3 Cloud kommer att säkerställa governance och compliance i våra kunders användning av Power Platform. Du fokuserar på säkerhet, datakvalitet och effektiva arbetsflöden, samtidigt som du ger stöd och råd till kunder när det behövs.
   

  

*Du kommer bland annat:*
* Säkerställa governance och compliance inom Power Platform hos våra kunder, inklusive miljöer, datakvalitet och säkerhet.
* Granska lösningar och flöden för att säkerställa säkerhet, regelverk och kvalitet.
* Upprätta och underhålla riktlinjer, policys och best practices för utveckling och automatisering i Power Apps, Power Automate och Dataverse.
* Identifiera och föreslå förbättringar av processer och arbetsflöden för att minimera risker och maximera effektivitet.
* Vägleda och stötta kunder i frågor som rör governance, säkerhet och best practices inom Power Platform


*Vi söker dig som:*
* Har minst 5 års erfarenhet av governance, säkerhet, compliance eller miljöhantering i molnlösningar, gärna Microsoft 365 och Azure
* Innehar god förståelse för Power Platform (Power Apps, Power Automate, Dataverse) och hur man styr och förvaltar plattformen på organisationsnivå
* Kan analysera, granska och följa upp lösningar för riskhantering och kvalitetssäkring
* Är kundfokuserad, lösningsorienterad och tar initiativ för att förbättra och utveckla processer
* Kan flytande svenska i tal och skrift då det krävs i det dagliga arbetet


**Vilka är vi?**
 Vi är B3 Cloud, ett härligt gäng med specialistkunskaper inom molntjänster utspridda i Göteborg och Stockholm. Vi tror på att dela kunskap, stötta varandra och ständigt utvecklas tillsammans – både som team och som individer.
   

  

 Som en del av B3 Consulting Group har vi resurser, kompetens och stöd i ryggen samtidigt som vi bibehåller dynamik och flexibilitet med korta beslutsvägar. Vi är stolt över att vara del av en verksamhet som präglas av inkludering och en strävan efter att ha en positiv påverkan på samhället, människor och miljön. Vi värdesätter olikheter och erfarenheter och arbetar kontinuerligt med inkludering och kultur för samarbete och respekt.
   

  

*Vi erbjuder:*
* Frihet och flexibilitet att påverka din utveckling, arbetstider och uppdrag
* Kompetensutveckling genom utbildningar, certifieringar och lunchföreläsningar
* Konkurrenskraftig lönemodell och en otroligt flexibel samt förmånlig RAM modell.
* En givande företagskultur med konferensresor, AW:s och wellness-aktiviteter

title: Lösningsarkitekt/Systemansvarig
description:
Vill du fortsätta bygga din utvecklarkarriär hos ett företag som kombinerar ambition med gemenskap och som dessutom utsetts till en av Sveriges bästa arbetsplatser nio år i rad? 
 



 På Multisoft hjälper vi några av Sveriges största företag att digitalisera och automatisera komplexa processer med vår egenutvecklade low-code plattform Softadmin®. Vi växer snabbt och söker nu en lösningsarkitekt/systemansvarig (LA/SA) som vill vara med och bidra till vår fortsatta resa. 
 



  





**Om rollen** 




 Med Softadmin® skapar vi verkligt värde för företag genom automatisering och effektivisering. Som LA/SA hos oss är du en central funktion i att förverkliga kundens vision – från idé och kravbild till färdig lösning. Du deltar aktivt i projekt tillsammans med våra kunder och omvandlar kravbilden till tydliga och genomarbetade specifikationer som utvecklingsteamet kan arbeta vidare med. 
 



  





 I rollen kommer du att: 
 


* Analysera och förstå verksamhetens behov
* Ta fram hållbara och skalbara lösningsförslag
* Designa integrationslösningar i komplexa systemmiljöer
* Driva en löpande och konstruktiv dialog med kunden



 Hos oss kombinerar du affärsförståelse, teknisk kompetens och kunddialog – med ansvar för att lösningen fungerar både tekniskt och verksamhetsmässigt. Rollen innebär mindre fokus på ren programmering, men kräver en stark teknisk förståelse och en helhetssyn på systemutveckling. Du behöver kunna ta strategiska beslut kring systemarkitektur, resonera kring integrationsstrategier och vara bekväm med att felsöka på en övergripande nivå. 
 



  





**Vem är du?** 




 Vi tror att du är någon som brinner för automatisering och effektivisering. Du har tidigare erfarenhet av att arbeta med integrationer i olika former och är van att arbeta i större och mer komplexa systemmiljöer. Du har arbetat i kundnära roller och känner dig trygg i dialogen med beställare och verksamhet. Erfarenhet av databaser, datamodellering och SQL är meriterande. 
 



  





 Vi ser gärna att du: 
 


* Är en van programmerare – teknisk förståelse väger tyngre än specifikt språk
* Har erfarenhet av integrationsarbete i komplexa system
* Har god förståelse för systemutveckling och arkitektur
* Trivs i en roll med helhetsansvar
* Är strukturerad, kommunikativ och lösningsorienterad



 För att lyckas i rollen krävs det att du har en relevant universitetsexamen (t.ex. inom systemutveckling, datavetenskap eller ingenjörsområdet). Du måste behärska både svenska och engelska flytande i tal och skrift. 
 



  





**Varför Multisoft?** 




 Från första dagen får du en strukturerad onboarding med coaching, tydliga mål och kontinuerlig feedback som gör att du snabbt blir trygg i rollen. Här är det högt tempo och mycket energi, men också omtanke, gemenskap och en vilja att lyfta varandra. Hos oss på Multisoft får du mer än bara ett jobb – du får en möjlighet att växa och utvecklas i en miljö där ambition och gemenskap går hand i hand.
 



  





**Ansökan** 




 Skicka gärna in din ansökan så snart som möjligt – urvalet sker löpande. Fyll i formuläret längst ned på sidan.

title: Network Security Architect
description:
På HiQ söker vi dig som brinner för nätverk och säkerhet och som vill kombinera arkitektur och hands-on-expertis. Hos oss får du både designa och bygga nästa generations nät- och säkerhetslösningar, från målarkitektur och design till implementation, optimering och vidareutveckling.
   

  

 Tänk dig att kliva in på jobbet och växla mellan att ta fram arkitektur och design för komplexa nätverk, och att själv vara nere i konfiguration, felsökning och optimering. Våra kunders miljöer spänner över stora datacenter, hybrida plattformar och molnlösningar med gott om utrymme för teknikdjup och innovation.
   

  

**Du kommer att…**
* Arbeta brett med switching, routing och wifi i både klassiska serverhallar och moderna moln- och hybridmiljöer. Du är med och bygger robusta lösningar med SD WAN, VPN och lastbalansering och ser till att de fungerar stabilt i vardagen, inte bara på ritbordet.
* Jobba med nätverkssäkerhet på både detaljnivå och helhetsnivå – från brandväggar, IDS/IPS, proxy, loggning och PKI till hur allt hänger ihop i en säker arkitektur. Samtidigt använder du programmering och automation för att förenkla, kvalitetssäkra och utveckla nätet. Du rör dig i virtualiserade och containerbaserade miljöer som VMware och Docker/Kubernetes och får utrymme att prova ny teknik när den dyker upp.
* Arbeta med lösningar från flera leverantörer som Cisco, Juniper, HPE/Aruba, Palo Alto, Fortinet och Azure. Certifieringar är ett plus, men det som väger tyngst är din vilja att hela tiden ta nästa steg och lära dig mer.
* Utveckla och förvalta nätverkslösningar som klarar dagens krav och samtidigt förbereder kunderna för det som kommer härnäst. Du samarbetar nära både kollegor och kunder, testar idéer, utforskar ny teknik och vässar din kompetens inom allt från SD WAN och datacenter till moln och nätverkssäkerhet.


**Vi tror att du:**
* Har minst tre-fem års erfarenhet av nätverk och säkerhet i större eller komplexa miljöer, där du både arbetat praktiskt med drift/implementation och haft ett tydligt inslag av design/arkitektur.
* Trivs med att växla mellan strategiskt och operativt arbete. Du gillar att ta ansvar för hur lösningar hänger ihop, men vill också fortsätta vara nära tekniken.
* Är van att navigera mellan olika teknologier och leverantörer och kan motivera dina val, både inför tekniker och beslutsfattare.
* Talar och skriver svenska obehindrat och har en nyfikenhet som driver dig att både fördjupa din tekniska kompetens och utvecklas i en mer arkitektonisk riktning.


**Varför HiQ?**
 Sedan 1995 har HiQ hjälpt kunder och användare att göra livet enklare med teknik, design och kommunikation. Vi har alltid haft två fokus: att ha roligt på jobbet och att leverera bättre lösningar än förväntat – det är det som driver oss! Som HiQ:are är vi stolta över vår kultur där resultat, ansvar, enkelhet och glädje står i centrum. Vi tror på samarbete för att nå gemensamma mål och på att stötta varandra att växa. Här får du inte bara utveckla din egen kompetens, utan också chansen att lära av, leda och inspirera dina kollegor.
   

  

 Låter det spännande? Skicka in din ansökan och bli en del av vårt nätverk, vi ser fram emot att höra hur du vill bidra till vår gemensamma resa!

title: Event Marketeer
description:
**Om rollen**
 Brinner du för marknadsföring och att skapa content som fångar uppmärksamhet, bygger relationer och driver verkliga resultat? Har du redan testat dina vingar inom digital marknadsföring, kommunikation och sociala medier och står nu i ett vägskäl redo att ta nästa steg i en roll där din kommunikation når tusentals människor?
   

  

 Vi på Easyfairs Nordic söker en Event Marketeer som vill vara med och skapa engagerande kommunikation för två av Sveriges största och mest inflytelserika event:
 **Ekonomi & Företag** 
 och
 **Personal & Chef.** 
 Här får du arbeta med marknadsföring som märks på riktigt – från första kampanj till fulla eventgolv med engagerade besökare och utställare.
   

  

 Easyfairs är en av Europas ledande eventarrangörer och driver några av Nordens viktigaste eventarenor, inklusive Kistamässan och Malmömässan.
   

  

**Din roll – skapa content som når rätt målgrupp och driver engagemang**
 I rollen som Event Marketeer ansvarar du för att planera, skapa och optimera marknadsföring som driver räckvidd, engagemang och konvertering. Du arbetar nära projektledare, säljteam och innehållsspecialister och spelar en central roll i hur våra event kommuniceras och upplevs.
   

  

 Du kommer att:
   

  

* Skapa engagerande content för sociala medier, webb, nyhetsbrev och kampanjer
* Planera och genomföra marknadsaktiviteter som driver trafik, registreringar och deltagande
* Anpassa budskap och innehåll för olika målgrupper och kanaler
* Säkerställa att kommunikationen är relevant, träffsäker och varumärkesbyggande
* Analysera resultat, följa upp kampanjer och optimera innehåll baserat på data
* Bidra till att utveckla och stärka våra event genom strategisk och kreativ marknadsföring. Du arbetar både strategiskt och operativt – från idé och innehållsskapande till publicering, analys och optimering.


**Kvalifikationer**
 Du har redan börjat bygga din kompetens inom marknadsföring och känner dig trygg i att skapa innehåll som engagerar och når ut. Du förstår hur man kommunicerar effektivt i digitala kanaler och hur content bidrar till affärsresultat.
   

  

**Vi söker dig som:**
* Har en eftergymnasial utbildning inom marknadsföring, kommunikation eller liknande
* Har erfarenhet av digital marknadsföring, content creation och resultatdrivet arbete i sociala medier
* Har förmåga att skapa engagerande och målgruppsanpassat innehåll
* Är en duktig storyteller
* Kan arbeta självständigt och driva ditt arbete framåt
* Innehar grundläggande kunskaper i content- och designverktyg som Canva eller Adobe Creative Cloud. Datadriven marknadsföring och kampanjuppföljning
* Talar och skriver obehindrat på svenska och engelska


**Meriterande är erfarenhet av:**
* WordPress och SEO
* Marknadsföring i verktyg så som Salesforce Marketing Cloud eller HubSpot
* Google Marketing Platform (GA4, Looker, Search Console)
* Eventmarknadsföring eller B2B-kommunikation


**Din personlighet – nyfiken, kreativ och resultatorienterad**
 För att lyckas i rollen tror vi att du:
   

  

* Har ett starkt intresse för marknadsföring och kommunikation
* Gillar att skapa content som engagerar och skapar värde
* Är nyfiken och vill utvecklas inom digital marknadsföring
* Tar initiativ och driver ditt arbete framåt
* Trivs i ett högt tempo och en dynamisk miljö
* Gillar att samarbeta och bidra till teamets framgång


 Vi värdesätter din drivkraft, kreativitet och vilja att utvecklas minst lika mycket som din erfarenhet.
   

  

**Om Easyfairs**
 Hos oss får du vara en del av en organisation som satsar på:
   

  

* engagerade medarbetare
* smart teknik
* starka varumärken


 Våra värderingar är
 **kreativt entreprenörskap** 
 ,
 **integritet** 
 ,
 **resultatfokus** 
 och att vi
 **alltid ska ha kul tillsammans** 
 – under planeringen såväl som när vi öppnar dörrarna till våra event.

title: Java Tech Lead till Ictech i Stockholm!
description:
**Ictech intar Stockholm!** 




  





 Vi öppnar nu vårt nya kontor i Stockholm! Med lång erfarenhet i branschen och ett starkt nätverk i regionen bygger vi en stabil grund för fortsatt framgång. Ictech, grundat 2011 i Göteborg, är ett växande konsultbolag med 190 anställda över 5 olika orter, specialiserade på system- och mjukvaruutveckling.  Led ett Java-team, forma tekniska riktningar och skapa hållbara lösningar. Vi söker en Tech Lead med passion för både kod och människor!

 och

 , med bred kompetens



  





 Som anställd på Ictech får du möjlighet

title: SAP Cloud ERP Finance Architect
description:
**We help the world run better**
 At SAP, we keep it simple: you bring your best to us, and we'll bring out the best in you. We're builders touching over 20 industries and 80% of global commerce, and we need your unique talents to help shape what's next. The work is challenging – but it matters. You'll find a place where you can be yourself, prioritize your wellbeing, and truly belong. What's in it for you? Constant learning, skill growth, great benefits, and a team that wants you to grow and succeed.
   

  

**YOUR TEAM**
 We are experienced team of architects located across several Nordic countries. Our team works both with on customer assignments and with our sales colleagues to position viable approaches that support our customers’ situations. We help customers get approaches implemented and realize value. We conceptualize solutions, but we also enjoy getting our hands into the system. Together as a team, we make miracles. We are looking for and open-minded and flexible colleague who will complement our team of highly esteemed experts to make SAP Cloud ERP successful. Apply now, and let’s start discussion on how you can build your own track in SAP.
   

  

**Role Description**
 We are looking for a finance architect for SAP Cloud ERP. Your focus is on understanding end-to-end finance processes and principles, with deep finance domain expertise. You have solid experience with SAP ERP implementations, preferably in the public cloud, and a strong functional background. You listen carefully to uncover customer pain points and requirements, and you drive those requirements into design and delivery. You support and guide stakeholders to make sound decisions, steering them toward fit-to-standard solutions, SAP best practices, and relevant scope items. You lead finance process discussions and translate requirements into clear solution options and adoption roadmaps. You enjoy leading and guiding with a gentle, professional manner, collaborating internally and externally across the ecosystem to accelerate adoption.
   

  

 You can be located in any of the Nordic Countries. Relocation is not supported.
   

  

**As an SAP Cloud ERP and public cloud-focused finance architect, you will**
* Master the public cloud project lifecycle.
* Leverage a minimum of five years’ finance domain expertise and either at least two end-to-end SAP Cloud ERP public cloud implementations or two years of hands-on public cloud delivery experience, to guide customers confidently.
* Use a public-cloud architect approach to help customers design and adopt best practice, end-to-end solution concepts.
* Guide customers to maintain clean-core principles in SAP Cloud ERP, prioritizing fit-to-standard, standard scope items, and SAP Best Practices content, and using approved extensibility instead of core modifications.
* Support customers in automating their finance processes, leveraging intelligent capabilities and embedded AI within SAP Cloud ERP.
* Actively participate in delivery to demonstrate how modern SAP solutions can be adopted.
* Collaborate effectively with SAP partners.
* Manage internal teams and collaborate with partners during the solution approach definition process.
* Build trusted-advisor relationships with customer stakeholders.
* Partner with Sales and Account teams to present the benefits and value proposition of SAP finance solutions and architecture.
* Work with Sales on demand creation by attending customer or prospect meetings to present SAP services capabilities and delivery approach.
* Prepare system demos and discuss processes and functional features.


**YOUR PROFILE**
* You are used to leading customer discussions and have an approach that moves customers forward.
* You can take a helicopter view to see the overall architecture.
* You are eager to deep-dive when a concept requires a closer look.
* You use systems to prove that concepts are working.
* You can communicate easily with developers and management.
* Business communication in both English and the regional language is needed.


**Bring out your best**
 SAP innovations help more than four hundred thousand customers worldwide work together more efficiently and use business insight more effectively. Originally known for leadership in enterprise resource planning (ERP) software, SAP has evolved to become a market leader in end-to-end business application software and related services for database, analytics, intelligent technologies, and experience management. As a cloud company with two hundred million users and more than one hundred thousand employees worldwide, we are purpose-driven and future-focused, with a highly collaborative team ethic and commitment to personal development. Whether connecting global industries, people, or platforms, we help ensure every challenge gets the solution it deserves. At SAP, you can bring out your best.
   

  

**We win with inclusion**
 SAP’s culture of inclusion, focus on health and well-being, and flexible working models help ensure that everyone – regardless of background – feels included and can run at their best. At SAP, we believe we are made stronger by the unique capabilities and qualities that each person brings to our company, and we invest in our employees to inspire confidence and help everyone realize their full potential. We ultimately believe in unleashing all talent and creating a better world.
   

  

 SAP is committed to the values of Equal Employment Opportunity and provides accessibility accommodations to applicants with physical and/or mental disabilities. If you are interested in applying for employment with SAP and are in need of accommodation or special assistance to navigate our website or to complete your application, please send an e-mail with your request to Recruiting Operations Team: Careers@sap.com.
   

  

 For SAP employees: Only permanent roles are eligible for the SAP Employee Referral Program, according to the eligibility rules set in the SAP Referral Policy. Specific conditions may apply for roles in Vocational Training.
   

  

 Qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to their age, race, religion, national origin, ethnicity, gender (including pregnancy, childbirth, et al), sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, protected veteran status, or disability, in compliance with applicable federal, state, and local legal requirements.
   

  

 Successful candidates might be required to undergo a background verification with an external vendor.
   

  

**AI Usage in the Recruitment Process**
 For information on the responsible use of AI in our recruitment process, please refer to our Guidelines for Ethical Usage of AI in the Recruiting Process.
   

  

 Please note that any violation of these guidelines may result in disqualification from the hiring process.

title: Tender Support Specialist
description:
**Description**


**The opportunity**


The role provides direct support to Sales and Tendering team by contributing to accurate, competitive sizing of operational efforts for tenders, as well as developing execution strategies and delivery schedules in alignment with Network Control global practices and delivery models.

  

With extensive hands-on experience in executing SCADA/EMS/ADMS international projects within complex environments, the Tender Support Specialist serves as an integral part of the bid team. This role contributes to the development of competitive and feasible proposals, directly impacting the profitability of the organization.  

  

This position reports directly to the Tender Support leader inside the Project Office group and collaborates closely with Sales, Engineering, Supply Chain and Tendering teams.

**How you’ll make an impact**

* Recommend solid execution strategies and define the right mix of in‑house, outsourced, local, and remote delivery models.
* Anticipate challenges in multi‑country and emerging‑market execution while ensuring coherent, cost‑effective, low‑risk delivery approaches.
* Estimate project management and engineering efforts using structured methods and early risk identification in the tender phase.
* Balance cost, risk, and margin protection with realistic and achievable execution conditions.
* Clearly define project scope, obligations, and responsibilities across Hitachi Energy, customers, suppliers, and partners.
* Validate timelines, software release assumptions, and resource availability; produce realistic project schedules and workload plans.
* Lead Execution Reviews, support Tender Gate Reviews, and ensure compliance with global governance practices.
* Drive process improvements by standardizing templates and promoting digital and AI tools for estimation, bidding, and contract workflows.

**Your background**

* Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Electrical Engineering, Power Systems, or related field
* 10-15 years in SCADA/ADMS/EMS/DMS/GMS project delivery and strong understanding of architectures and implementation lifecycles
* Mastery of project management frameworks (PMI, IPMA) and estimation methodologies
* Proven track record in emerging markets (Latin America, Africa, Middle East, Southeast Asia)
* Project estimation methodologies and scheduling techniques
* Ability to structure emerging market delivery strategies (Permanent Establishment setup, partnering models, local content)
* Soft skills as commercial mindset (balance technical excellence with margin protection), intellectual courage (challenge unrealistic assumptions) and excellent communication across technical and commercial stakeholders are a great advantage to be successful in this position.
* Fluent English is required, Spanish and Swedish highly desirable

**What we offer**

* Collective agreement
* Flexible working hours
* Health care and wellness allowance
* Fantastic career possibilities within Hitachi Energy both within Sweden and globally
* Mentor to support you throughout onboard phase
* Various training and education supporting employee development
* Diversified company with over 70+ nationalities working in Sweden
* Supplementary compensation for parental leave
* Employee Benefit Portal with thousands of discounts and perks

**More about us**


Are you ready for a new exciting challenge? Does the above description sound like you? Welcome to apply! Applications will be reviewed on an ongoing basis, so don’t delay – apply today!

  

Recruiting Manager Nicolas Lamblin, Nicolas.lamblin@hitachienergy.com, will be happy to answer your questions regarding this position. Union representatives – Sveriges Ingenjörer: Jan Skogeby, +46 107-38 16 42; Ledarna: Frank Hollstedt, +46 107-38 70 43; Unionen: Karin Ulvemark, +46 107-38 51 42. All other questions should be directed to Talent Partner Julia Wiklund, Julia.wiklund1@hitachienergy.com.

**Qualified individuals with a disability may request a reasonable accommodation if you are unable or limited in your ability to use or access the Hitachi Energy career site as a result of your disability. You may request reasonable accommodations by completing a** **general inquiry form** **on our website. Please include your contact information and specific details about your required accommodation to support you during the job application process.**
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**This is solely for job seekers with disabilities requiring accessibility assistance or an accommodation in the job application process. Messages left for other purposes will not receive a response.**

title: Software Download / Vehicle Support Engineer – ALTEN
description:
Are you passionate about hands‑on vehicle technology and eager to grow in a fast‑developing engineering environment? ALTEN is now looking for a **Software Download / Vehicle Support Engineer** for an exciting in-house project within one of Sweden’s leading automotive companies. This role offers a combination of practical workshop tasks and advanced troubleshooting within electrical and electronic systems.

**About the Role**


As a Software Download / Vehicle Support Engineer, you will support the in‑house engineering team with test vehicles and rigs throughout the physical build process. You will work closely with engineers and technicians, contributing to successful development work in early phases.


Your main responsibilities include:

* Performing fault tracing and SWDL (Software Download) on test vehicles and rigs
* Programming, downloading, and configuring ECUs
* Supporting early-stage EE engineering activities
* Troubleshooting complex electrical/electronic issues in lab, rig, and truck environments
* Hands-on work in workshop, lab, and various company facilities
* Occasional travel to dealers and end users to assist with support and testing


This role suits someone who enjoys a dynamic workday, thrives in technical environments, and appreciates teamwork.



**Who We Believe You Are**


You have:

* Experience working with vehicle electrical and electronic systems
* Good understanding of vehicle electrical architecture
* Preferably, broad knowledge of complete trucks and an end-user perspective
* A proactive mindset and the ability to work independently
* A strong customer‑focused approach and service‑oriented attitude
* Good analytical and problem‑solving skills
* A structured way of working and flexibility to handle diverse tasks
* A collaborative spirit and willingness to take responsibility

**Meritorious Skills**

* Experience from product development
* Knowledge of tools such as **CANalyzer, Kola, Protus, PROTOM, Configurator, SE‑Tool, and ClearQuest**
* **C‑driver’s license (C‑körkort)**

**Why ALTEN?**


At ALTEN, you become part of a global network of skilled engineers and specialists. We offer great opportunities for professional growth, competence development, and the chance to shape your own career path. As a consultant, you’ll work on exciting assignments while being supported by a strong organization that values your ambition and well‑being.


  
JOBB DETALJER


 17/02/2026


Göteborg
REKRYTERING KONTAKT


 ALTEN Sweden

title: Graduate Program - Tieto Tech Consulting (m/f/d)
description:
Job Description **Are you ready to make a real impact?**


At Tieto, we advance businesses and societies with digital solutions that drive meaningful progress. Start your career in a place where purpose guides innovation — and where your work helps create positive change for people, communities, and the world around us.

  

We’re now recruiting **Graduates** in Sweden for fall 2026 to help build secure and futureready banking solutions that people and companies rely on every day. As a graduate, you’ll join a diverse team of 15,000 experts and work hands-on with modern technologies to turn ideas into real impact.

 **The Program**


The Graduate Program is designed for tech students who want to build a solid foundation in modern software development. It is offered within Tieto’s Professional Services unit, now part of Tieto Tech Consulting, providing a focused environment where you can grow your technical and consulting skills. As part of a team developing custom solutions for the banking sector, you’ll gain hands-on experience across the full software development lifecycle. Through rotations in different customer projects, you’ll deepen your expertise in areas such as requirements analysis, development, and testing—while also gaining practical insight into the role of a consultant.


Throughout the program, you’ll receive a broad introduction to our company, our culture, and the markets we operate in. You’ll also get valuable exposure to real customer assignments, giving you the knowledge, support, and confidence to kick-start your career with us.

 **What we offer?**


Once onboard you will get full access to: a personal mentor, young professional network activities & gatherings. You are immediately enrolled into our well-established learning communities and experience from collaborating with multiple digital disciplines. Apart from this we offer:  



* Professional and personal growth. We believe that learning and growing together helps us to become better every day. You get to challenge yourself as you will get onboarded to work in our tech company with the support of your leader, team, and personal mentor. You will also have your own buddy as a trusted friend!
* Community of professionals and friends. Ask anyone, the number one reason to join us is people! You will have a chance to build your network across the company through our Learning Communities and together with other graduates through our Young Professionals Community!
* Genuinely impact our society's future by working on meaningful projects that will impact millions of people. You get to influence how digitalization serves millions of people, today and tomorrow. We work with customers of all sizes, and both in the private and public sector.

 **Who might you be?**


To understand and enjoy the role we believe you should be a driven and proactive person who constantly wants to learn new things while also sharing your knowledge with others. You have a genuine interest in technology and are comfortable using AI tools and want to work in close collaboration with our customers. Through the program, we will give you the skills to become a professional consultant.


You have a recent academic degree within IT- or computer science, e.g. a civil engineer, engineer or software development education. You are fluent in Swedish and English, both oral and written.

 **Location?**


The program will start in September 2026 and you will be located in Stockholm.

 **The recruitment process**


In our business we are solving our customers’ challenges every day. Diversity enables innovation – and innovation is what we live on in this highly dynamic technology sector. Diverse teams enable creating best user experiences for the diverse users of digital services and solutions. We achieve this by offering a thought through and fair recruitment process.

* Your gateway to us will be through our gamified recruitment process. This process is tailored to give you a fair and objective screening that is also fun to experience.
* You will also be tested in your JAVA skills.
* We use your assessment results, questionnaire answers and CV to match you with the open Graduate positions available.
* Based on this, selected candidates will be invited to a first manager interview followed by a technical interview and a test and requirement interview.

  



We would like you to upload your CV and a short motivational letter in your application. In addition to your CV, we ask that you also upload copy of university and/or college grade transcripts. For applicants with ongoing studies, a preliminary grade transcript for completed courses should be submitted.  



Please note, you will not be able to edit your application after it has been submitted, please make sure all attachment and information is correct before submitting your application.

  

Looking forward hearing from you. We will review the applications as they come in.

 ***We perform background checks on all final candidates.***  

Tieto declines calls from recruitment companies.

  



  

Additional Information  

At Tieto, we believe in the power of diversity, equity, and inclusion. We encourage applicants of all backgrounds, genders (m/f/d), and walks of life to join our team, as we believe that this fosters an inspiring workplace and fuels innovation. Our commitment to openness, trust, and diversity is at the heart of our mission to create digital futures that benefit businesses, societies, and humanity.

title: Engineering Manager
description:
PinMeTo helps large multi-location companies manage their business information across hundreds of online services, by developing and offering a SaaS platform that puts businesses in control of their location data and lets them manage online interactions with their customers. Our SaaS offering consists of a platform of web applications developed internally by our Product department at our headquarter office in Malmö, Sweden.
  
Our Product department has grown over the past year and we are now looking to add an Engineering Manager. As Engineering Manager you will be direct manager for the engineers in your team as well as operationally responsible for the output of the team. The engineering manager has a technical background and is expected to be involved in the day to day operations, including spending some time working hands on with the rest of the team to handle the workload.
  
  

Responsibilities
  
Direct manager for 5-10 software engineers.
  
One-on-ones with direct reports.
  
Coach and give feedback to improve performance.
  
Performance evaluations for salary revision.
  
Interviewing and hiring new engineers.
  
Ensure that all deliverables are shipped quickly and meet business needs while maintaining a high standard of quality.
  
Lead the team in day-to-day/week-to-week prioritization.
  
Ensure team has effective ways of working.
  
Reporting to CTO.
  
  

Qualifications
  
Higher education in Computer Science related fields or equivalent experience.
  
Strong background in software engineering, preferably as a senior software engineer or similar.
  
Hands-on experience developing web applications, preferably SaaS-based B2B products.
  
Experience with technical leadership and teamwork.
  
Passion for coaching people to success.
  
Business level in English, both written and verbal.
  
  

Practicalities
  
This is a full time role based in Malmö, Sweden.
  
We have an office first working environment, so we assume you are located around the Malmö area.
  
  

We review applications on a rolling basis. To apply, please email your CV and a brief cover letter to jobs@pinmeto.com with the subject line: 'Application - Engineering Manager'.

title: Systems Engineer
description:
Är du en teknisk, flexibel och lösningsorienterad person som tycker om att arbeta med systemframtagning, systemdesign och flödet kring krav och verifiering när det kommer till försvarssystem?
  
Har du ett intresse av att arbeta med framtidens teknik i en innovativ och växande organisation och vill hjälpa till att skapa en tryggare vardag genom att utveckla IT-system som fokuserar på samverkan inom Sverige, NATO och dess allierade?
  
Då har vi rätt tjänst för dig!
  
Din nya utmaning
  
Vi söker ett fåtal systemingenjörer som kan hade lite olika profil som kommer arbeta tillsammans för att lösa en stor varians av uppgifter tillsammans. Dessa områden kan inkludera:
  
  

Krav, kravanalys och assurans
  
  

Systemdesign kring hårdvarusystem
  
  

Elektronik
  
  

Test och verifiering
  
  

IT-säkerhet
  
  

Med en relativt liten och flexibel organisation så kommer du få en stor varians i arbetsuppgifter, arbeta inom hela projektflödet och få möjlighet att komma i kontakt med flertalet olika projekt och ta en central del i att leverera nya försvarsförmågor med kvalitet!
  
Huvudsakliga arbetsuppgifter
  
  

Arbeta med att analysera, bryta ner och realisera systemkrav
  
  

Definiera och dokumentera hur system skall utformas
  
  

Upprätta spårbarhet för att säkerställa assurans mellan krav, design, implementation och tester
  
  

Inrätta verifieringsstrategier, var och när skall delsystem testas för att säkra en fungerande slutleverans
  
  

Ta fram testspecifikationer för olika delsystem inför olika testtillfällen
  
  

Genomförande och analys av testresultat för att säkerställa att systemet fungerar enligt kraven
  
  

Det här bidrar du med
  
  

Du har en kandidatexamen eller motsvarande utbildning inom systemutveckling, elektronik, mekatronik eller motsvarande erfarenhet
  
  

Förmåga att analysera komplexa system och identifiera problem i ett tidigt skede
  
  

Skriva tekniska rapporter, kravdokument och testplaner på ett tydligt sätt
  
  

Erfarenhet att arbeta med tvärfunktionella team i projekt med flera discipliner
  
  

Förståelse kring Systems Engineering processer inkl.
  
  

Kravanalys och specifikation
  
  

Spårbarhet och förändringshantering
  
  

Testmetodik och strategi
  
  

Du måste vara svensk medborgare då tjänsten är säkerhetsklassad. Du talar och skriver flytande på svenska och engelska.
  
Vad vi erbjuder dig
  
  

En engagerande och utvecklande roll i ett ledande företag i en expansiv bransch.
  
  

Möjlighet att arbeta med projekt som bidrar till nationell säkerhet och försvar.
  
  

En samarbetsvillig och stöttande arbetsmiljö med engagerade kollegor.
  
  

Kollektivavtal (Teknikföretagen).
  
  

Wellnessteam och friskvårdsbidrag.
  
  

Eget Gym och omklädningsrum med bastu.
  
  

Regelbundna hälsoundersökningar.
  
  

Happiness teamet ordnar med roliga och personalvårdande aktiviteter.
  
  

Arbete i helt nybyggda ändamålsenliga lokaler vid Rosersbergs pendeltågsstation.
  
  

Lär känna oss
  
På MilDef blir du en del av ett företag som värdesätter praktiskt engagemang och tvärfunktionellt samarbete. Vi erbjuder möjligheten att utveckla nya kompetenser, bidra i en rad olika projekt och göra en konkret skillnad för vår verksamhets framgång.
  
Är du driven och redo för en utmanande och givande roll? Ansök redan idag! MilDef.com
  
För information om tjänsten, kontakta gärna Viktor Attoff, Head of Projects and Solutions, viktor.attoff@mildef.com.
  
Vi gör löpande urval men sista ansökningsdag är 8 mars 2026.
  
Important information
  
Vi genomför bakgrundskontroll och drogtest på alla våra framtida kollegor innan anställning.
  
MilDef - WE ARMOR IT.
  
MilDef is a global systems integrator and full-spectrum provider specializing in rugged IT for defense and security domains. MilDef provides hardware, software and services that shield and protect critical information streams and systems, when and where the stakes are the highest.
  
MilDef’s products are sold to more than 200 customers through companies in Sweden, Norway, Finland, Denmark, United Kingdom, Germany, Switzerland, the United States and Australia. MilDef was founded in 1997 and is listed on Nasdaq Stockholm since 2021.
  
We kindly decline contact from advertising and recruitment sales.
